Samtidigt är du en del av en global koncern där vi är hela 60 000 medarbetare fördelat över 30 länder och kan vara med att påverka digitaliseringens framfart på riktigt – det är det vi menar med ”The world is how we shape it”, alltså att det vi gör för våra kunder varje dag skapar verklig förändring som formar världen och dess riktning framåt.
   

  

 Vi har en positiv kultur som tenderar att sprida sig hos våra kunder. Kulturen bygger bland annat på kunskapsdelning, självledarskap, transparens och teamwork. Med passion för människor och teknik skapar vi en bättre framtid tillsammans.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Ansök enkelt genom att antingen ladda upp ditt CV eller länka direkt till ditt LinkedIn-konto via annonsen på vår hemsida! Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar inkomna via mail. Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Eva Aldén, [email protected]
   

  

  

  

 Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Test Lead
description:
**B3** 
**Financial** 
**Consulting erbjuder lösningar till banker, finansinstitutioner och** 
**försäkringsbolag med behov av operativ ledning eller specialister inom förändringsarbeten.** 
**Våra konsulter har affärs- och verksamhetserfarenhet från bank, finans och försäkring** 
**och** 
**förståelse för digital transformation och olika metoder för att driva förändringar.**
 På B3 Financial Consulting har du stor frihet i rollen som konsult. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar och balans i livet, då vi vet att medarbetare som mår bra också presterar bättre. Vi tror också att utveckling skapas genom att lösa utmanande uppgifter i spännande uppdrag tillsammans med kollegor med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter.
   

  

 Läs mer om B3 Financial Consulting här.
   

  

**Vi söker testledare**
 Nu söker vi konsulter som drivs av att bidra till sin egen och andras utveckling. Som konsult hos B3 Financial Consulting genomför du både enskilda uppdrag och teamleveranser ihop med kollegor inom B3. Du hjälper företag med allt från enstaka analyser till hela förändringsresan och du arbetar både självständigt och tillsammans med kollegor.
   

  

 I rollen som testledare ingår bland annat att:
   

  

* Översätta affärs- och tekniska krav till testfall
* Ta fram teststrategier
* Vara kundens bollplank inom ditt kompetensområde
* Planera och genomföra system, integrations och acceptanstester
* Koordinera teamet
* Sammanställa status och prognoser


**Vi ser gärna att du har:**
* Erfarenhet av bank, finans och försäkring
* Gedigen erfarenhet inom test och testledning
* Tidigare arbetat som konsult
* Vana att arbeta i Jira och Confluence, eller liknande verktyg
* Utbildning inom agila arbetssätt, som tex Scrum eller SAFe
* Det är meriterande om du har arbetat med att främja samarbete och koordinering mellan IT- och affärsverksamheter, samt att du har god förståelse för digitalisering och automatisering
* Flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift är ett krav


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid ditt driv och din professionalism. Du brinner för att ständigt leverera över kundens förväntan och identifierar dig med devisen ”teamets framgång är min framgång”!
   

  

**Låter det som något för dig?**
 B3 Financial Consulting är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande konsultföretag inom IT och management och är utsedda till en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Vi utvecklas hela tiden med våra kunder, ansök till oss idag och följ med på vår resa! Vi kommer att intervjua kandidater löpande.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om hur det är att jobba på B3 och hur vi arbetar med vår wellness och våra sociala initiativ här.
   

  

 Klicka på ansökan eller tveka inte att kontakta VD Anna Abrahamsson Hägg på telefonnummer: 070-4912720 eller email: anna.a.haegg@b3.se

title: Research Scientist
description:
At Cepheid, we are passionate about improving health care through fast, accurate diagnostic testing. Our mission drives us, every moment of every day, as we develop scalable, groundbreaking solutions to solve the world’s most complex health challenges. Our associates are involved in every stage of molecular diagnostics, from ideation to development and delivery of testing advancements that improve patient outcomes across a range of settings. As a member of our team, you can make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale, within an environment that fosters career growth and development.
   

  

 Cepheid is proud to work alongside a community of six fellow Danaher Diagnostics companies. Together, we’re working at the pace of change on diagnostic tools that address the world’s biggest health challenges, driven by knowing that behind every test there is a patient waiting.
   

  

 Learn about the Danaher Business System which makes everything possible.
   

  

*As a Research Scientist* 
*your main responsibility is to contribute to new and improved products developed within the framework of Cepheids development plans.* 
*You are expected to be able to* 
*individually plan, perform and analyse experiments* 
*and thereby contribute to generating information in one or several of the ongoing product development projects.* 
*This includes mainly practical work in the laboratory in addition to planning and analysing experiments.*
*To be successful in this role it requires that you can, with a moderate level of guidance and direction, gain the knowledge needed to plan, perform and analyse experiments. You are also expected to contribute intellectually within your own discipline and be able to provide informal guidance to new team members. We expect you to be organized and paying attention to details when performing experiments. You should be a team player with good communication skills.*
*In addition to work within the projects you are expected to contribute with your competence to other activities within the department which may include planning, coordination and performing common tasks, suggesting improvements, reporting deviations, and by other means actively contributing to the fulfilment of goals within the project, department and company.*
*All tasks should be performed with high quality and within timelines.*
 This position is part of the Assay R&D team and will be in Solna, Sweden. At Cepheid, our vision is to be the leading provider of seamlessly connected diagnostic solutions.
   

  

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**
* Evaluate, test, and optimize real time PCR and RT-PCR assay procedures and assay prototypes based on design of experiments and design input requirements.
* Deliver experimental plans, perform and analyse experiments and report the deliveries.
* Actively contribute to achievement of goals in the project, department and company.
* Take part in sophisticated analytical problem-solving to reagent and system integration issues to identify critical performance factors for assay development
* Work in a team environment
* Analyze data using statistical tools such as Microsoft Excel, Minitab or JMP
* Work in a BSL3 environment


 Cepheid offers a dynamic and fast-paced role in a company with products that save lives. You will join a team with competent people who have fun together.
   

  

**The essential requirements of the job include:**
* Bachelor's degree in relevant scientific discipline (e.g., Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Cell Biology) with 2+ years of related work experience OR
* Master's degree in relevant scientific discipline (e.g., Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Cell Biology) with 0-2 years of related work experience.
* Knowledge of molecular biology methods such as PCR and real-time PCR, experimental design, data analysis and statistical techniques
* Ability to individually plan, perform and analyse experiments
* Good ability to structure, organize and prioritize lab work and to maintain detailed experimental records


 Experience from IVD product development under design control is a great advantage for this position.
   

  

**It would be a plus if you also possess previous experience in:**
* Experience from IVD product development under design control


 Cepheid, a Danaher operating company, offers a broad array of comprehensive, competitive benefit programs that add value to our lives. Whether it’s a health care program or paid time off, our programs contribute to life beyond the job. Check out our benefits at danaherbenefitsinfo.com.
   

  

 At Danaher we bring together science, technology and operational capabilities to accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life. Our global teams are pioneering what’s next across Life Sciences, Diagnostics, Biotechnology and beyond. For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
   

  

 At Danaher, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.
   

  

 At Danaher we bring together science, technology and operational capabilities to accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life. Our global teams are pioneering what’s next across Life Sciences, Diagnostics, Biotechnology and beyond. For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
   

  

 At Danaher, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.

title: License Owner, Stockholm
description:
**Passionate about football (soccer) AND about business? Stranger Soccer is expanding to key cities around the world. We are looking for a License Owner to open and operate the Stranger Soccer business in Stockholm.**
 This is not your traditional management job - it is truly built for someone that wants to own and operate their own business (that happens to make the world's greatest sport accessible to everyone). This role is ideally suited for an adventurous and football-passionate entrepreneur.
   

  

**Sounds Like You?**
 As a next step, please visit www.strangersoccer.com and particularly the section Bring Stranger Soccer to your City to learn more about this dynamic opportunity.
 **If it appears to be a fit, and you wish to learn more, please fill out the form there to officially express your interest.** 
 Be sure to download and explore the Stranger Soccer mobile app as well.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Bring the Stranger Soccer brand and business to life for the assigned city
* Recruit, train, and lead a small central team (2-3 persons) as well as a few freelance Official Hosts (game hosts) to kick off the operation
* Identify and secure prime slots at football venues to run Stranger Soccer games
* Engage in creative sales and marketing digital and hands-onto ensure that customers are introduced to the platform as a convenient and preferred way to play
* Oversee a schedule of games, ensuring customers are delighted with each game they play, and keep coming back for more
* Take advantage of the strong backing and direction of Singapore headquarters, where an operations and technology team is ready to support you.


**You should have**
* A passion for football, and a strong connection to your local football scene
* A business background, ideally in management and customer service
* An entrepreneurial background or spirit
* A commitment to owning, driving, and scaling the Stranger Soccer brand in the assigned market
* A hunger to succeed: financial compensation for this role will be proportionate to hard work, business acumen, and effectiveness.


**About Stranger Soccer**
 With 3.5 billion football enthusiasts in over 200 countries, football is the most popular sport in the world. But why dont more people play it? Stranger Soccer (www.strangersoccer.com) makes playing football as easy as going for a jog or to the gym. Browse dozens of games on its acclaimed Mobile App. Book a slot. Turn up and play.
   

  

 Incorporated in 2017, Stranger Soccer has quickly transformed the sports & recreation scene in Singapore. In a few short years, it has grown to be the #1-way people play football and futsal in the country, amassing tens of thousands of registered users purchasing thousands of slots every week. Whether you call it Fussball, Fútbol, Calcio, or anything else, the world now awaits.
   

  

**Our Mission**
 To make playing football as easy as going for a jog.
   

  

**Our Vision**
 A world in which playing football is as popular and widespread as watching football.
   

  

**Got what it takes?**
**We look forward to meeting you.**

title: Inköpare Directa Upplands Väsby
location: Upplands Väsby kommun, Stockholm County, Sweden
description:
**Din nya tjänst** 




 Detta är en rekrytering till vår kund Directa.
 



  





 Directa söker nu en operativ inköpare. Du kommer i din roll tillhöra produktionsplanering- och inköpsgruppen som omfattar tre personer och ingår i produktionsavdelningen.
 



  





 Directa är ett globalt bolag inom dentalindustrin som är stabilt, lönsamt, snabbt växande med ca 50 anställda i Sverige. Vi är innovativa och snabbfotade. Du kommer att vara en del av en familjär, öppen och generös kultur där det finns mycket frihet under ansvar.
 



  





 Directa är placerade i Upplands Väsby och är alltigenom en modern arbetsgivare med en rad förmåner. Exempel; Under juli, juni och augusti arbetar ni sommartid, subventionerad massör, kollektivavtal och bonus.
 



  





 Du erbjuds ett spännande arbete på ett företag med ambitioner.
 



 Läs gärna mer om din framtida arbetsgivare här:
 **https://directadental.com/** 




  





**Rollen** 




 I din roll som "operativ" inköpare kommer dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter att vara:
 


* Inköp av material, komponenter och produkter baserat på planerade behov
* Bevakning av inköp, frisläppning, lagerläggning av hel- och halvfabrikat
* Leverantörskontakter, leverantörsbedömningar och uppföljning
* Underhålla relevant data i ERP-system



  





 Du kommer att rapportera till produktionschefen och är placerad på huvudkontoret i Upplands Väsby.
 



  





**Din bakgrund** 




 Rätt person har ett par års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom inköp eller logistik. Med fördel har du någon form av teknisk utbildning påbyggd med utbildning inom inköp eller logistik. En KY-utbildning tror vi räcker utmärkt för denna roll.
 



  





 Meriterande med erfarenhet av ERP-system och arbete inom produktion/tillverkande industri. För tjänsten krävs god svenska och engelska.
 



  





**Du som person** 




 I rekryteringen lägger Directa stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet och vi söker dig som är angelägen om att ta ansvar och nå resultat. Du är noggrann, strukturerad och van vid att arbeta självständigt och har också förmågan att vara en bra och prestigelös lagspelare. Vidare är du positiv och har en vilja att driva arbetet med entusiasm och engagemang.
 



 Är det här du? Varmt välkommen att forma din framtid tillsammans med Directa!
 



  





**Din ansökan** 




 Hjärtligt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan och har du frågor ringer du till Christer Johansson på Thalamus 070-296 56 44. Söker tjänsten gör du lämpligast via vår hemsida eller annan lämplig annons. Sista ansökningsdag är 25/10-24.
 



  





 Intervjuer kommer att ske fortlöpande och kan du börja omgående blir vi extra glada.
 



 Vi ser fram emot att få läsa din ansökan.
 



  





**Din nya arbetsgivare** 




 Directa AB är en av Nordens snabbast växande tillverkare av dentala produkter. Fokus ligger på utveckling och tillverkning av smarta och unika produkter som underlättar i det dagliga arbetet för tandläkare. Directa AB marknadsför och säljer sina produkter i över 90 länder.
 



 Directa AB ingår i Directa Dental Group som även består av Directa Inc, Parkell Inc, JH Orsing AB och Topdental Products Ltd. Directa Dental Group omsätter ca 960 miljoner och har 200 anställda. De största exportmarknaderna är för närvarande: Tyskland, Frankrike, USA, Japan, Storbritannien och Skandinavien. Directa AB:s huvudkontor ligger i Upplands Väsby. Läs mer på
 **www.directadental.com**

title: Executive Vice President & CHRO of the ASSA ABLOY Group
description:
Are you able to deliver on our mission to be a world leading organization where people succeed? We are looking for a CHRO to head up Human Resources and to continue driving our transformation from a decentralised conglomerate to a decentralized group with a strong identity and a common culture - Together We.
   

  

**What You Would Do As EVP And CHRO**
 As our Executive Vice President and CHRO you will lead the Human Resources function and be responsible for executing and continuing the development and transformation of our group People strategy. This is a unique opportunity to shape and drive the future of the people agenda in our organization. You will own our HR processes, including Talent Acquisition, Talent Management, Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Belonging, Comp & Ben, HR Governance, HRIS and Health & Safety, and ensure that they support our overall business strategy. You will also play an important role in enabling a culture and leadership based on our core values: empowerment, innovation and integrity, and to continue driving our transformation where we want to form a common identity and culture for the ASSA ABLOY group. As a key member of the ASSA ABLOY Executive Team you report directly to the President and CEO of the ASSA ABLOY Group, working in close collaboration, as well as with the Group CFO. You will be responsible for driving the implementation and execution of the Group strategy, including the strategic people initiatives that form part of our 2030 vision. The role is global and you need to be prepared to travel extensively.
   

  

 You will also:
   

  

* Drive organizational development and support in M&A activities
* Be a valuable speaking partner/sounding board for the CEO, the Executive Management team and the ASSA ABLOY board
* Manage a team of skilled HR colleagues around the world, chair the global HR-Board, champion Health and Safety, and build a strong global HR community
* As a member of the ASSA ABLOY Executive Team, you will promote and support collaboration within the organization to ensure that synergies, resources and business opportunities are fully utilized
* Strengthen our Employer Brand and make us the employer of choice


**The Skills And Experiences You Need**
 We are looking for someone who has:
   

  

* Several years’ experience of leading the Human Resources function, as a critical member of an International P&L driven leadership team, within the industrial/technology sector, creating and implementing its people strategy and agenda
* Experience from driving extensive change and transformation in a decentralised matrix organisation
* Experience from supporting a growing organization organically and through acquisitions with HW, SW and Services in the portfolio
* Experience from a digitized HR-environment utilizing data analytics and technology in order to create transparency and efficiency
* Has a true business interest and always takes a stance on how to support our business
* Solid experience from leading people and teams directly and in a matrix environment, being able to create an inclusive culture of transparency


 You believe in recruiting and promoting based on merit and inspiring an environment of initiative and courage, where diverse talent and teams can thrive. You are seen as a thought leader within HR, with strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate, influence and add value in discussions across our divisions. We think you are a true leader with extensive experience of understanding the requirements of how to drive a function forward. You are passionate about digitization and quickly adopts new concepts and ideas. You thrive in an organization characterized by delegation and accountability, as well as structure and processes. To be successful in the role, you should also have the ability to prioritize and work in a complex environment where you need to handle conflict and different agendas. You are a leader who acts immediately to take necessary, and sometimes difficult, decisions.
   

  

**Applications are reviewed as they are received – don’t hesitate to send yours in!**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working in this role. Just set up your profile and apply, no later than 30th September 2024. To ensure your personal data is kept safe, we don’t process any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, please contact Elin Eriksson VP & Head of Talent Acquisition, at elin.eriksson@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Application Security Consultant
description:
**About Accenture Security**
**Be yourself,** 
**Influence the future**
**Are you ready to take your skills to a new level?**
 At Accenture, working days are never the same and that´s why we have fun here! This is a great opportunity to build a rewarding career at
 **Accenture Security.** 
 With us, you get to work in a relaxed bold team, with talented and supportive colleagues. We support your individual skills in an engaging work community where everyone is allowed to be themselves. We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. At Accenture, you get to work on customer projects at the world´s leading companies. Accenture is a leading global consulting company that provides services in strategy, consulting, digitalization, technology, and outsourcing. With experience, specialized expertise, global resources, and extensive industry expertise. Accenture works at the business and technology level to help customers increase their performance and develop sustainable value for their stakeholders. With over 700.000 employees and customers in more than 120 countries, Accenture drives innovation for a simplified everyday life. We are currently looking to recruit
 **Application Security Experts** 
 to be a part of our global security community
 **.**
**What We Are Looking For**
- Bachelor's or Master’s degree in IT/Information Technology/Computer Science.

- Minimum 4 years of work experience within the cyber security field.

- Deep experience with secure software development, application security and/or DevSecOps.

- Experience with cloud solutions such as Azure, AWS, GCP and/or infrastructure.

- Experience in engaging directly with technical representatives from clients during system development.

- Familiarity with standards, regulations, and frameworks such as: OWASP, OIDC, OAuth, XACML, or GDPR.

- Proficient in both spoken and written Swedish (or other Scandinavian languages), as well as English.

**Nice to have**
- Developer skills in areas such as Java, Spring framework, NodeJS, microservices architecture, Docker, Kubernetes, microservices, and more.

- Hands-on experience from security tools like Veracode, Splunk, Snyk, or similar.

- Relevant certifications: CCSK, CISSP, CSSLP, or similar.

- Current or former Norwegian security personnel clearance.

- Experience in leading projects and/or technical teams.

**Life at Accenture**
 Throughout your time at Accenture, we do not only offer our people the training they need but also expect them to take the time to learn and grow in a culture of continuous improvement. As you progress through your career in the path you choose, you will move more and more towards a leadership role in the truest sense of the word. Leaders lead by respect, knowledge and by helping those more junior than themselves. You will also be assigned a career counselor over time.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer and inclusive and inspiring work environment with access to our global network and ample training opportunities. You will be able to develop your skills within security and grow both personally and professionally. Our projects are built on cooperation and teamwork, and you will find yourself teaming with other talented, passionate and dedicated consultants, all working towards a shared goal. Some of our benefits:
   

  

  

- Accenture Sweden employees are entitled to minimum of 5 weeks of vacation every year.

- All employees in Accenture have a pension saving plan.

- Health Insurance

- Health Allowance at 5000 SEK per year

- Within Accenture, you are encouraged to do trainings related to your profession, to develop your skills.

 We also offer:
   

  

  

- A unique opportunity to use technical knowledge to contribute to innovation and socially changing projects – Accenture has a large customer portfolio across all industries. Which brings with it many exciting opportunities!

- Great professional challenges and a unique opportunity to apply your expertise and work on projects that matter to you and the society.

- Everyone in Accenture has a dedicated internal career counsellor and sparring partner with whom you can discuss personal development in confidence.

- Good bonus schemes, competitive salary, minimum 5 weeks of vacation, health insurance, pension schemes, share savings program and parental leave covered beyond NAV’s terms and conditions up to 12G.

- A packed social calendar for those interested. We have regular beer, board game night, watch handball match, play volleyball, go surfing, play chess and go cross-country skiing, etc

**We look forward to learning more about you!** 
 Apply online, attach your CV and letter of application in English. If you have any questions, please contact responsible recruiter: karl.kego@accenture.com

title: Experienced Manager to Technology Strategy & Transformation
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?** 
  

  

 Deloitte's business area Consulting is a market leader in Sweden and works together with decision-makers in both global and local organizations.
   





 In our Technology Strategy & Transformation practice, we work with our clients to bridge business strategy and technology, shaping technology visions as a catalyst for transformation of the broader business. Our teams support clients in areas such as technology strategy, enterprise architecture, technology operating models, governance, cost reduction, M&A, IT sourcing, and large-scale technology transformations.
   





**Technology Advisory Consultant (Mid-Senior level – Manager)**




 We are looking for an experienced
 **Manager** 
 to join our Technology Strategy & Transformation (TS&T) team in Stockholm.
   





 Your team will together help our clients to develop the technology strategies and solutions that create business value and drive performance. From strategies and target state designs to implementation of our client’s future technology operations, you contribute with valuable knowledge and experience to our clients most complex challenges. The team also works to further grow and develop our successful TS&T consulting practice in Stockholm.
   





**Your contribution**



* Lead technology advisory or transformation projects from planning to execution
* Manage and coach junior colleagues in client delivery and individual development journeys
* Contribute and support in business development by driving/supporting client proposals or bids and undertaking dialogue with potential and existing clients
* Develop and maintain trusted relationships across client organizations and within Consulting to generate new, creative approaches to solve challenges and create opportunities
* Active contribution in practise development through your area of expertise


**Qualifications**

**We are looking for**



* A business-driven person with previous management consulting experience and broad understanding of technology, staying up to date with technology trends and what’s happening in the market
* A team player who enjoys collaboration with clients and colleagues with a strong desire to excel and be committed to gaining exposure to multiple industries and types of projects
* A track record of leading diverse people and teams and managing technology projects that leverage technology to drive business value in commercial or public organizations
* Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience in technology strategy, management, operating models, sourcing, enterprise architecture, technology transformations or equivalent areas
* Excellent written and verbal ability in Swedish and English
* Minimum bachelor’s degree within a field relevant for technology and IT, e.g., Computer and Systems Science or Industrial Engineering, or equivalent
* Experience from interacting with and influencing technology leaders and can have a broad conversation on the most relevant issues on the technology agenda
* Sound business acumen, analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment and recommendations
* A person spurred by revenue generation targets with track record in achieving / exceeding
* Coachable and embracing of best practices and feedback as a means of continuous improvement


**Additional Information**

**We offer**




 At Deloitte we focus on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths. By on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University and support from a personal coach, you will have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout your career.
   

  

**The way of working at Deloitte – our commitment to you**




 At Deloitte we
 **foster a collaborative culture** 
 where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights, and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
   

  

 Our role is to
 **unlock potential for growth and innovation** 
 . We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals, and ambitions.
   

  

 We
 **work together with our clients** 
 to help find the right solution and to help to apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we have started.
   





**How to apply**




 You apply online. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible, as we are screening applications continuously and interviewing on a rolling basis. Please submit your CV, cover letter and university grades as part of your application.
   

  

 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  

**Questions?**




 For questions regarding the role or application process, please contact Rasmus Öhman, Talent Acquisition Specialist, at rohman@deloitte.se
 
 .
   






**We are looking forward to your application!**




**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: IT-säkerhetssamordnare
description:
Vi letar efter dig som brinner för att organisera, bygga upp och leda ett IT-säkerhetsarbetet. Har du tekniska kunskaper och erfarenhet av IT-säkerhetsarbete och är redo att ta nästa steg mot en strategisk roll inom IT-säkerhet? I såna fall kan detta vara din chans!
   

  

**Rollen**
 För vår kunds räkning letar vi nu efter en IT-säkerhetssamordnare som ska leda och utveckla IT-säkerhetsarbete i verksamheten. Kunden har en hög ambition att digitalisera sina verksamheter, för att göra detta på ett säkert sätt behöver IT-säkerheten gå hand i hand med den digitala utvecklingen. Du kommer att ha nyckelroll i denna utveckling och kommer tillsammans med dina kollegor i enhetens teknikgrupp ansvara för verksamhetens IT-miljö.
   

  

 Rollen innebär att ansvara för samordning och genomförande av säkerhetshöjande aktiviteter. Det innebär arbetsuppgifter så som att:
   

  

* Koordinera och implementera säkerhetsåtgärder både i samarbete med kollegor, verksamheten och leverantörer samt självständigt.
* Skapa och utveckla strategier för IT-säkerhet anpassade efter kundens behov och omvärld, med hänsyn till ekonomiska aspekter.
* Identifiera och analysera hot mot IT-säkerheten med hjälp av loggar, larm och externa säkerhetsorganisationer.
* Följa trender och delta i branschkonferenser för att hålla sig uppdaterad. Underhålla kontakter med leverantörer och andra relevanta aktörer.
* Arbeta med den interna säkerhetsfunktionen kring frågor som dataskydd och informationssäkerhet.
* Planera och utföra både interna och externa säkerhetsgranskningar. Ta fram beslutsunderlag med ekonomisk och funktionell analys för olika målgrupper.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som vill organisera, bygga upp och driva IT-säkerhetsarbetet inom den offentliga sektorn. Vi ser gärna att du sedan tidigare har erfarenhet av att jobba med IT-säkerhetsfrågor i verksamhetssystem och IT-infrastruktur.
   

  

 Som person tar du initiativ, sätter igång aktiviteter och uppnår resultat genom ett systematiskt och metodiskt arbete där du har stor nytta av din breda tekniska kunskap eller erfarenhet av IT-säkerhetsarbete och IT-säkerhetsprodukter.
   

  

**Krav:**
* Praktisk erfarenhet av ett IT-säkerhetsarbete, antingen som systemadministratör eller som it-säkerhetssamordnare eller motsvarande profession inom flera av områdena Central infrastruktur, Cloud, nätverk, verksamhetssystem eller klient.


**Meriterande:**
* Leda, driva och utveckla IT-säkerhetsstrategier och systematiskt IT-säkerhetsarbete.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft 365 Defender och säkerhetsfunktioner i Office365 och Azure, SIEM-verktyg och kravställning.
* Arbete med sårbarhetsanalyser, pen-tester.
* Relevanta Certifieringar inom området (ex. CISSP, CASP+) eller motsvarande.


 PASSAR VI DIG?
   

  

 Wise IT arbetar med kompetensförsörjning inom IT. Vår uppgift är att hitta rätt person till rätt IT-jobb, genom rekrytering och konsulter. Vi tror på människan i en framtida teknikutveckling och brinner för att bygga relationer, inkludera fler i IT-branschen och naturligtvis matcha rätt kompetens till rätt uppdrag. Vi vill vara en självklar go-to career partner oavsett om kandidaten söker jobb i dagsläget eller inte. Vill du vara med på vår resa? Läs mer om oss, vår kultur och våra värderingar på vår karriärsida.
   

  

 ANSÖKAN
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar får du gärna höra av dig till Sharmin Atroushi (sharmin.atroushi@wiseit.se). Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.

title: Datasamordnare till T-baneprojekt för Region Stockholm
description:
**Nu söker vi en Datasamordnare med lång erfarenhet till ett långt uppdrag på 3 år!**
****Om uppdraget****
 Uppdraget är ett konsultuppdrag på 100% via Bemannia med start 26/9- 2024 tom 15/9- 2027 med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara placerad på enhetens kontor i Solna och det finns möjlighet till distansarbete till viss del.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara placerat inom Avdelning Norr som driver utbyggnaden av tunnelbanan till Arenastaden, Barkarby samt Depå i Högdalen. Avdelningen är uppdelad i flera projekt och en stab. Du kommer att tillhöra funktionen för datasamordning inom staben, men arbetat består av att stödja projekten i data- och informationsrelaterade frågor.
   

  

 Tjänsten innefattar ett viktigt samordnande arbete med varierande arbetsuppgifter där du kommer att arbeta självständigt och proaktivt mot avdelningens övriga datasamordnare.
   

  

****Dina arbetsuppgifter****
* Att leda samordningen av avdelningens datasamordnare inom datasamordnings- och överlämningsfrågor.
* Att arbeta med granskning, kravställning, kvalitetssäkring, lagring och distribution av leveranser och informationsmängder.
* Avstämning inom funktionen datasamordning.
* Fungera som en samverkande funktion till de parallella projekt/entreprenader/verksamheter som pågår inom avdelningen.
* Delta i samverkansgrupper inom Nya tunnelbanan.
* Månadsrapportering av funktionens arbete och dagsläge till stabschef.
* Lägesrapportering av funktionens arbete och dagsläge på stabsmöte.
* Arbeta proaktivt med överlämningsfrågor, stötta handläggare, avdelning och förvaltning i framtagande av rutiner och anvisningar samt, exempelvis, ärendelista.
* Aktivt arbeta med erfarenhetsåterföring mellan projekt och förvaltning genom att samla upp, paketera och distribuera kunskap beroende på exempelvis projektens faser eller moment.


**Dina kvalifikationer**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom samhällsbyggnadssektorn.
* Minst fem (5) års erfarenhet av datasamordning i bygg-/anläggningsprojekt.
* Arbetat med leveranshantering i minst ett (1) större multidisciplinärt infrastrukturprojekt, så som anläggningsprojekt, bygg- och installationprojekt alternativt järnvägsteknik.
* Erfarenhet av att arbetsleda en grupp från minst ett tidigare uppdrag.


 Som person har du social förmåga samt god förmåga att uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift. I rollen kommer du att ha breda kontaktytor, både internt och externt. En förutsättning för att vara framgångsrik i rollen innebär således att du har god förmåga att skapa och underhålla relationer, ta initiativ i sociala och professionella sammanhang samt att du trivs i samspel med andra. Vi ser också att du är strukturerad och att du har god förmåga att ta egna initiativ.
   

  

**Meriterande**
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat i produktionsskede i byggprojekt.
* Erfarenhet av relationsskede och samordning av slutdokumentation från minst 1 projekt.
* Erfarenhet av att ha tillämpat CAD verktyg och samgranskningsverktyg som Autocad, Revit, Microstation, Naviswork eller Solibri i minst 1 år.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med modellhantering, ritningar, BIM, VDC, geografisk IT, data och visualisering från minst 1 projekt.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta på beställarsidan i minst 1 år.


**Vad vi erbjuder dig**
 Som konsult på Bemannia erbjuder vi dig en nära kontakt med din konsultchef och en möjlighet till fler uppdrag via oss. Hos oss får du utvecklas på lärorika arbetsplatser och känna att din kompetens kommer till nytta.
   

  

**Om ansökan**
 Sök tjänsten genom att klicka på ansök nedan. Ladda gärna upp ditt cv i word-format och på svenska. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag,
 **18/9**
 Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail men har du specifika frågor kring tjänsten besvaras dessa av ansvarig rekryterare,
 **Anna Radhe ,anna.radhe@bemannia.se**
 För generella funderingar kring din ansökan eller vår rekryteringsprocess når du oss under kontorstid på
 **0708934700**
 Bemannia är ett publikt och svenskägt bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag som tillhandahåller kompetent och kvalificerad personal genom uthyrning, rekrytering och personalentreprenader inom Organisation & Ledarskap, PR & Information, Marknad & Sälj, Ekonomi, Juridik, HR & Personal, Fastighet & Teknik, IT & Data samt Kontor & Administration. Bemannia har ramavtal med merparten av Sveriges Myndigheter och Sveriges kommuner, dess förvaltningar och bolag. Bemannia är medlem i Kompetensföretagen och är ett auktoriserat Bemanningsföretag och Rekryteringsföretag samt har kollektivavtal med Unionen, Akademikerna, SEKO samt LO och Hotell- och Restauranganställdas förbund. Bemannia är certifierat enligt SS-EN ISO 9001:2015, Ledningssystem för kvalitet, SS-EN ISO 14001:2015, Miljöledningssystem – krav och vägledning, SS-ISO 45001:2018, Ledningssystem för arbetsmiljö och SS-ISO/IEC 27001:2013 Ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet
   

  

 Ledningen för bolaget har varit verksam i branschen i 40 år.

title: Manager - Industrial Engineering
description:
The project to implement Scania's first battery factory is in full swing and we in the engineering team are looking to reinforce our organization to be able to take on all the exciting challenges in battery production while looking ahead to a future with new projects. This creates the need of more experienced leaders to drive the introduction of our new organization.
   

  

 If you are an experienced group manager, ready for a new challenge and feel that it would be exciting to be part of the journey ahead, then you are most welcome to apply to us.
   

  

**Your profile:**
* As a leader, you are open and communicative.
* You include your employees in decisions and work actively with feedback to create conditions for your employees to grow in their roles and towards our common goal of creating the world's best battery factory!
* You are driven and committed and create trusting relationships both within your own organization and outside.
* You have very good analytical skills. You are interested in technology and can easily familiarize yourself with details while having an understanding of the whole.
* As a manager, you are responsible in ensuring that your employees have the conditions in place to create good results at the right time. You work independently but ask for support and help when needed.
* You have most likely a degree from university/college, have experience from engineering and have worked as an engineering manager for at least 2-3 years.


**Your work assignment:**
 You are the responsible manager of a group consisting of project managers, industrial engineers and other specialists in the industrial engineering field. We work according to Scania's methods with focus on ensuring safety, quality and productivity. Part of the assignment is part of Traton's common product strategy and we therefore work on a regular basis with our colleagues within the group.
   

  

 You are part of a team of managers who jointly develop our way of working, together with our employees. We work cross-functionally to ensure standardized work across the entire Engineering organization and we would like to have diversity in our team.
   

  

 You are fluent in both Swedish and English language.
   

  

**Contact information**
 Please get in touch if you have questions or if you are curious to hear more about the role.
   

  

 Roger Pavón, Engineering Workshop Manager
   

  

 Battery Production/Investment projects, roger.pavon@scania.com
   

  

**Application:**
 The application must contain a CV, personal letter and copies of grades. We apply tests as part of the recruitment process. A background check may be conducted for the position. Apply through Scania's website no later than 2024-07-31
   

  

 Welcome with your application!

title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
**Job Description Summary** 




  





 We are looking for a Business Analyst for our Medication Delivery Solutions business unit based in Denmark, Norway, Finland, or Sweden, with a preference for someone located in Stockholm. In this role, you will support commercial teams, Business Unit Managers, and the Country Business Leader by providing key insights and analysis to drive informed decision-making. You will be crucial in helping the organisation meet its financial goals and strategic objectives. This role offers hybrid working with a home office option, ensuring a good work-life balance.
 



  





**OUR VISION FOR MDS AT BD** 




  





 As a leading manufacturer and supplier of products that are used daily in healthcare, the Medication Delivery Solutions (MDS) team provide a wide range of products for injection and infusion therapy, regional anaesthesia and closed medication management.
 



  





  





**Job Description** 




  





**We are the makers of possible** 




  





 BD is one of the largest global medical technology companies in the world. Advancing the world of health™ is our Purpose, and it’s no small feat. It takes the imagination and passion of all of us—from design and engineering to the manufacturing and marketing of our billions of MedTech products per year—to look at the impossible and find transformative solutions that turn dreams into possibilities.
 



  





**Why join us?** 




  





 A career at BD means learning and working alongside inspirational leaders and colleagues who are equally passionate and committed to fostering an inclusive, growth-centered, and rewarding culture. You will have the opportunity to help shape the trajectory of BD while leaving a legacy at the same time.
 



 To find purpose in the possibilities, we need people who can see the bigger picture, who understand the human story that underpins everything we do. We welcome people with the imagination and drive to help us reinvent the future of health. At BD, you’ll discover a culture in which you can learn, grow and thrive. And find satisfaction in doing your part to make the world a better place.
 



  





**Become a maker of possible with us!** 




  





**Main responsibilities will include:** 




  




* Perform comprehensive analyses to guide decision-making, manage risks, and find opportunities.
* Lead the forecasting and budgeting processes, ensuring accurate and timely completion in line with European business unit standards.
* Mentor a junior business analyst, supporting their development and growth within the team.
* Provide support and workshops to sales teams by addressing system-related questions.
* Offer financial insights to assist with planning and setting business objectives.
* Prepare financial reports and presentations for monthly business reviews with BU leadership and European counterparts.
* Develop and maintain monthly reports and analytical tools to meet the business unit's information requirements.
* Utilise tools such as Excel, Power BI, and Salesforce to enhance data-driven decision-making processes.



  





**About you:** 




  




* Bachelor’s degree in Finance or a related field.
* Proven experience as a business analyst, with a strong focus on financial analysis and data interpretation.
* Fluent in English and one Nordic language.
* Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, and Salesforce.
* Experience in healthcare or the medical device industry, especially in tender management within a large international organisation, is a plus.
* Strong analytical skills, adaptable to dynamic environments, and able to work both independently and collaboratively.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with a willingness to mentor and assist colleagues with IT tool-related queries, particularly regarding Excel.



  





**Click on apply if this sounds like you!** 




  





 Becton, Dickinson and Company is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. We do not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, age, sex, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, marital or domestic or civil union status, familial status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetics, disability, military eligibility or veteran status, or any other protected status.
 



  





**To learn more about BD visit:** 
 https://bd.com/careers
 



  





**Primary Work Location** 




 SWE Stockholm - Marieviksgatan

title: Enterprise Architect
description:
**Vi på B3 Visab Consulting fokuserar på att stödja finansindustrin med sin affärsutveckling i den digitala ekonomin. Därför söker vi efter engagerade Enterprisearkitekter som vill utforma, utveckla och förfina den övergripande arkitekturen hos bolag i en samhällskritisk bransch.**
 Med över 40 års erfarenhet från området har vi skapat djupa relationer med branschledande aktörer inom bank- och försäkringsindustrin. Vår gedigna erfarenhet och våra seniora konsulter gör oss även till en attraktiv partner för nya, snabbfotade uppstickare. Just nu söker vi fler etablerade enterprisearkitekter med erfarenhet från bank och försäkring.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill arbeta i ett företag med sympatiska värderingar, erfarna kollegor och en attraktiv ersättningsmodell. Om du, liksom vi, värnar om en arbetsmiljö där samarbete, prestigelös kunskapsdelning och utveckling frodas, är detta en unik chans för dig att vara med och bidra till vår starka kultur samtidigt som du ges möjlighet att växa i din yrkesroll.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som konsult hos oss ges du möjligheter till intressanta uppdrag hos spännande kunder. Att du har förmågan att skapa relationer och på ett prestigelöst sätt samarbeta i team tror vi är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i dina uppdrag. Uppdragen hos kund varierar men kan bl.a innebära att du kommer att vara ansvarig för att utforma, utveckla och förfina den övergripande arkitekturen, inklusive IT-system, processer och resurser. Detta inkluderar arkitektursstrategi, målarkitektur och lösningsarkitektur som går i linje med den övergripande affärsstrategin samtidigt som prestanda, säkerhet, lagkravsefterlevnad och liknande måste tillgodoses.
   

  

**Vidare ser vi att du har följande kvalifikationer:**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet från enterprisearkitektrollen.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet från bank- eller försäkringsområdet.
* Erfarenhet från konsultrollen.
* Certifieringar och erfarenheter inom relevanta områden.
* Arbetar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet som verksamhetsarkitekt.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv lönemodell.
* Goda förutsättningar för flexibla arbetstider.
* Möjligheter att gå relevanta utbildningar och ta attraktiva certifikat.
* En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning. Läs mer här


**Varför B3 Visab Consulting:**
 B3 Visab Consulting är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Således kan vi erbjuda det bästa av två världar. Styrkan hos ett stort börsnoterat bolag i kombination med den härliga samhörigheten som ett mindre bolag erbjuder.
   

  

 Vi är även stolta över att vi nominerats till och vunnit fler olika priser som "Årets Karriärföretag" och som Sveriges bästa bolag enligt ”Great Place to Work”. Vi tror att det beror på vår energi, vårt sätt att välkomna olikheter och våra erfarenheter som vi gärna delar med oss av. En central del av energiskapandet är vår unika wellness-satsning Team B3. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bra och vill vara engagerade kollegor och goda medmänniskor.
   

  

 De som jobbar kvar hos oss efter många år pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetstider och utveckling. De talar även om stoltheten över att vara en del av ett bolag som inte bara levererar förstklassigt resultat till sina kunder utan även tar ansvar för samhället i stort bl.a. genom att vara partner till fina initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub, Pink Programming m.fl.
   

  

**Kontakt:**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, så ansök nu! Vi tar inte emot ansökningar vi mail men du är mer än välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Lidia på lidia.hagos@b3.se eller konsultchef Hanna Skoog på +4670-260 12 65 eller VD Susanne Nordvall: +4670-823 57 55.

title: Senior Solutions Architect
description:
**Description**
 Automat-it is an all-in AWS Premier partner that empowers startups with DevOps and FinOps expertise and hands-on services. We guide and support hundreds of startups leveraging AWS smarter throughout their growth journey. We save our customers significant time to market and optimize their cloud performance and cost-effectiveness.
   

  

 Automat-it operates in more than seven countries across EMEA. We provide a dynamic environment where you can expand your professional expertise and make a significant impact.
   

  

 In this position as Senior Solutions Architect, you will be a crucial member of the pre-sales process, working with account managers to develop AWS solutions for our startup customers.
   

  

 📍 Work location - hybrid from Stockholm.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement solutions to meet business requirements and create cost-efficient, highly available, and scalable solutions for customers, including Well-Architected reviews and SoW.
* Research and analyze current solutions and initiate improvement plans.
* Collaborate with other engineers and stakeholders to ensure solutions are designed and developed according to best practices.
* Share your knowledge with our customers and the cloud community by participating in public speaking engagements such as workshops, conferences, webinars, and more.


**Requirements**
* 3+ years of hands-on experience in an AWS environment, including implementation, migration, and maintenance, designing solutions end-to-end
* 2+ years of experience in technical customer-facing roles, such as Customer Engineering, SRE, Cloud Architect, or equivalent
* 2+ years of experience in an IT environment, including hands-on in Kubernetes, CI/CD, and DevOps tools - advantage
* Proven experience in a production environment, developing software with either Python, Go, Java, or equivalents
* In-depth knowledge of AWS's main services, with an emphasis on Kubernetes and Containers
* Successfully designed DevOps and Infrastructure for high-scale production environments in AWS
* Understanding of Information Security best practices
* Certified AWS Solutions Architect - Associate.
* AWS Solutions Architect Professional or a specialty certification - an advantage
* Ability to effectively communicate technical design in verbal and written formats in front of customers
* Ability to lead an end-to-end engagement with the account management team
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Swedish
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment


 Automat-it is committed to fostering a workplace that promotes equal opportunities for all. We firmly believe that cultivating a diverse workforce is crucial to our success. Our recruitment decisions are grounded in your experience and skills, recognizing the value you bring to our team.

title: Search Engine Marketer
description:
**About the job** 




 Do you have a keen interest in Google-optimized marketing and want to join us on our journey to become the world’s leading equestrian brand? In the role of Search Engine Marketer, you will be part of our Marketing Team and independently drive our search engine marketing and optimization efforts forward. To succeed and thrive in this role, you must possess strong analytical skills, can manage multiple tasks concurrently and a relentless drive to surpass performance expectations.
 



  





  





 Maya Delorez is an e-commerce company targeting a global market, which requires you to adapt your approach to different markets. Combining SEM and SEO, the role presents a dynamic work environment with substantial responsibilities, offering abundant chances for you to innovate and influence outcomes.
 



  





  





**Your responsibilities will include:** 




 As our Search Engine Marketer, you are responsible for setting the strategy for Maya Delorez’s SEO and SEM work and making sure it aligns with the brand’s goals and vision. To proactively identify growth opportunities, enhance campaign performance, and stay updated on industry news, you continuously monitor the market and competitors. Additionally, you collaborate with other teams within the company to design ads, campaigns, and website materials.
 



  





  





**SEM** 



* Monitor SEM-related KPIs and develop and implement effective strategies for different markets based on the results.
* Analyze campaign outcomes and deliver internal insight reports with actionable recommendations.
* Continuously optimize, develop, and track performance on Google Ads across different campaign types including Search, Performance Max, and YouTube. Responsible for reporting and analyzing results.
* Manage, plan, and optimize the account structure.
* Continuous keyword and behavioral analyses.
* Continuously search for growth opportunities, test ideas, and pursue successful initiatives.



  





  





**SEO** 



* Monitor SEO-related KPIs and craft effective strategies tailored to different markets, based on the outcomes
* Perform comprehensive keyword analysis to pinpoint pertinent search terms and emerging trends.
* Optimize
 *mayadelorez.com* 
 to enhance organic visibility and rankings.
* Track rankings for the website across all languages.
* Continuously monitor and analyze performance statistics to ensure the website maintains strong SEO hygiene.



  





  





**What you’ll need:** 



* Fluent in both English and Swedish.
* Experience in SEM and/or SEO, preferably within the e-commerce sector.
* Ability to take initiative and independently advance both SEM and SEO endeavors.
* Some experience in strategic campaign management, analysis, and reporting to evaluate outcomes and provide improvement recommendations
* Motivated by achieving results.
* Ability to think analytically.
* You approach problem-solving with creativity and have a solutions-oriented mindset.



  





  





***Meritorious, but not required:***



* Knowledge of and/or experience in equestrian sports
* Experience in feed optimization
* Experience with Google Analytics and/or Google Tag Manager.
* Hands-on experience with SEO tools such as Google Search Console, Ahrefs, Accuranker and Screaming Frog.
* Understanding of search engine algorithms and best practices in SEO and SEM.
* Previous experience working with other search engines, e.g. Bing.



  





  





 Highly valued personal qualities for this role include your ability to find solutions when challenges arise and your capacity for creative thinking outside the box. Additionally, your structured approach and analytical mindset enable you to identify market trends and improvement opportunities effectively. We also seek someone with a strong curiosity and a drive to develop their marketing skills further. To thrive in this role, you should be comfortable with quickly reprioritizing tasks as the varied nature of the job may require shifting focus promptly.
 



  





  




* **Employment** 
 : Full-time
* **Location** 
 : Uppsala, Sweden (100 meters from the station)
* **Start** 
 : As agreed



  





  





 This position offers flexible remote work opportunities.
 



  





  





 Maya Delorez is a Swedish D2C brand that is revolutionizing the equestrian fashion industry with innovatively designed riding clothes and accessories. We are a growing team of hardworking doers who are working together towards building the world’s leading equestrian brand. Our vision is big and ambitious, and we’re looking for people who want to join us for the ride – are you up for the challenge? 🚀
 



  





  





 To apply, please submit your CV and cover letter to rocky@mayadelorez.com and write
 **“Search Engine Marketer”** 
 in the subject line. Job sample tests will be requested during the recruitment process. Our selection process and interviews are ongoing, meaning the position may be filled prior to the final application deadline.

title: Senior Analytics & Performance Management Manager
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Do you know how to bring value out of data?
   

  

 If Yes, bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career! You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
   

  

**About Our Nordic SAP Business Group**
 As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major transformation programs.
   

  

 Within our Nordic community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4, SAP BTP, Datasphere, SAP Analytics Cloud, HANA, BW/4, and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at candidates for several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the largest enterprises in the Nordics and support them in their global transformation journeys

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Analytics group and contribute to thought leadership, competence development and sales initiatives.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career; functional, technical and as a leader.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert networks and benchmarks.

**As a senior Analytics professional in Accenture, you will:**
- Advise clients about best solutions in regards to Analytics and Data depending on their current situation and unique characteristics

- Lead a team that works closely together with clients to help them get real value out of their data by embedding analytics into their business processes.

- Advice and deliver analytics implementations based on S/4 Analytics extensibility, data warehouse solutions like Datasphere and BW/4HANA, hybrid scenarios leveraging data lake/lakehouse solutions, planning and frontend development in solutions like SAP Analytics Cloud.

- Be able to grow your professional skills within analytics, big data and AI.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through cutting-edge analytics.

- Work on selling Analytics projects to clients through RFP processes as well as part of daily work together with our clients.

**Required Qualifications**
- Extensive experience in defining and implementing analytics and planning solutions

- Deep functional knowledge within at least one area of Finance, Sales, Manufacturing or Logistics

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Passionate about innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English and a Nordic language

- Experience working with sales of Analytics solutions

- M.Sc. or B.Sc. in Business or Engineering, such as Computer Science or Mathematics/Statistics

- Hands-on experience with SAP Analytics technologies such as S/4 Analytics Extensibility, SAP Analytics Cloud (reporting & planning), Datasphere, BW/4 or HANA.

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience with data lake/lakehouse solutions

- Experience with enhancing Analytical solutions through AI

**Location**
 Stockholm
   

  

 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: Interimschef inom projektledning sökes till Älvsjö
description:
Är du ute efter nästa steg i karriären? Vår kund söker nu efter en interimschef med tidigare projektledarerfarenhet. Låter detta som något för dig? Sök tjänsten idag då vi tillämpar löpande urval!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Ekonomi/juridik/inköp
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, 100%
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 1 november
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vår kund är Nordens största anläggning för mässor, konferenser och event. I över 75 år har de arrangerat tusentals möten i olika kategorier som alla inspirerat, bidragit med kunskap och skapat affärer. 50-65 arrangemang genomförs årligen varav 20-25 är mässor som de arrangerar i egen regi. Mötesformerna omfattar allt från små och stora företagsmöten, publika mässor och fackmässor till galor, Tv-produktioner och stora internationella kongresser.
 


  


 Vi söker nu en gruppchef för Kongresser & Guest Event som skall leda och ha personalansvar för en grupp om 11 stycken ”eventprojektledare” samt 2 stycken CAD-designer. Du kommer att rapportera till Affärsområdeschef för Kongresser och Guest Events. Avdelningen hanterar både interna och externa gästande event.
 


  


 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av
   

**event management**
 och genomförande av
   

**nationella och internationella event**
 eller liknade verksamhet, gärna med försäljningsbakgrund. Har du förståelse och kunskap om teknisk försäljning såsom produktion, AV etc så är det meriterande för denna tjänst. Uppdraget startar 1 november och förväntas pågå i minst 8 månader. Kontorstider tillämpas och arbetsplatsen ligger i Älvsjö.
   




**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Du ska planera, leda och fördela det dagliga operativa arbetet
  
* Utveckla, driva, samordna och effektivisera samt kvalitetssäkra den operativa planeringen, beställning av lokaler & tekniska tjänster och produkter för produktioner av våra egna mässor och Kongresser och Guest Event
  
* Övergripande ansvara för att operativt genomföra gästande event med avslutning samt utvärdering
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har minst 3-5 års erfarenhet av ledarskap
  
* Har minst 3-5 års erfarenhet av arbete med genomförande av event samt arbetat med försäljning
  
* Har mycket goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska
  
* Har goda kunskaper att arbeta i olika IT system och lätt att sätta sig in i nya system
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat processinriktatUtbildning:
  
* 3-5 års erfarenhet av resultatorienterat arbete och budgetansvar
  
* Förståelse och kunskap om teknisk försäljning såsom produktion, AV etc
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ansvarstagande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Vianne Caroan eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth1@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107005

title: Solution Architect AI
description:
**SOLUTION ARCHITECT AI**
 Would you like to work in an international environment where you will make a difference every day? We are looking for game-changers to join us as we innovate for individuals and develop the world’s most advanced assistive solutions.
   

  

 At
 **Permobil** 
 , the people who use our products come first. Our purpose is to create advanced assistive solutions that make the lives of adults and children living with disabilities more enriching. Our people are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver innovations that improve lives. We are a sustainable and responsible business committed to continuous improvement, and our customers can trust us to provide market-leading solutions driven by insights-based clinical data.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 In the role as AI architect, you are responsible for designing and implementing AI solutions that will enable our company to grow and enhance our market offerings but as well optimize our internal processes. You will define long-term strategic goals and short-term tactical plans for the AI domain, particularly in the field of Generative AI.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Keep up-to-date with the latest developments in Generative AI, actively follow open-source project and explore innovative AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
* Support and guide projects with solution design decisions and provide information about impacts and costs.
* Ensure that proposed and existing solutions meet all requirements from the EA framework, with regards to quality, security etc.
* Verify that all contracts with suppliers support the needs of the business, and that all suppliers meet their contractual commitments,
* Support with incident and change management as needed to support our daily operations,
* Adhere to standard Software Validation procedures by collaborating with System Owners, Stakeholders and Compliance Resources.
* Develop and drive the AI strategy, identifying opportunities for AI integration across the organization, defining and driving a roadmap for AI initiatives
* Lead the design and architecture of AI solutions, ensuring that they align with business goals and the Permobil target architecture.
* Ensure alignment of solution designs with architecture and technology strategies.


**Qualifications**
* University degree in IT, engineering or related discipline,
* 2 years or more working as a solution architect or in a similar role or other relevant experience
* Proven experience in AI including Generative AI, Machine Learning and Data Modeling,
* Good knowledge of system development methods and standards,
* Interest in both open-source AI frameworks and libraries as well as closed-source projects,
* Well spoken and written English.


**Who Are You**
 You are goal-oriented, ambitious and see opportunities where others see obstacles. You want to make a difference for others, and you see the value of the connection between your work and the positive impact on others' lives. You seek solutions and are ready to take on a challenge to chase your dreams.
   

  

 You don't necessarily follow the crowd - you find new ways to work and go where you see potential to make your mark.
   

  

**Why is Permobil the next step for you?**
* You’ll make a difference. Every day Everything we do leads to understanding and improving the lives of our users. Through our evidence-based innovation, we make a difference to people’s lives.
* You’ll make your mark as part of our future We collaborate with colleagues across borders to Innovate for Individuals. The impact you make personally could lead change around the world.
* You’ll feel welcome from day one We’re known for being great colleagues, who are collaborative, fun and at the cutting-edge. Everyone at Permobil cares as much as you do about making a positive difference.


**Application Process**
 We will conduct selection continuously so send us your application today or before
 **June 15th** 
 at the latest!
   

  

 Permobil is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
   

  

 For additional information about the position, please contact Mats Weckberg, Director Enterprise Architecture, mats.weckberg@permobil.com
   

  

 For information about the recruitment process, please contact Zivile Mitkute, Talent Acquisition Partner, zivile.mitkute@permobil.com
   

  

**Please respect that we do not wish recruitment assistance or advertising, we decline calls from recruitment and advertising providers.**
**More About Permobil**
 Permobil founder Dr. Per Uddén believed that helping people achieve the greatest level of independence is a basic human right and, for over 50 years, Permobil has held fast to that belief. Permobil is a global leader in advanced rehabilitation technology, passionate about better understanding our users’ needs and improving their quality of life through state-of-the-art healthcare solutions. Today, those solutions include power wheelchairs, seating and positioning products, power assist, and manual wheelchairs.
   

  

 Permobil is part of Patricia Industries, a subsidiary of Investor AB, and is headquartered in Sweden. Permobil has 1600 team members in more than 15 countries around the world. For more information regarding the company’s storied history and complete product line, visit permobil.com

title: Customer Service Specialist
description:

title: Search Engine Marketer
description:
**About the job** 




 Do you have a keen interest in Google-optimized marketing and want to join us on our journey to become the world’s leading equestrian brand? In the role of Search Engine Marketer, you will be part of our Marketing Team and independently drive our search engine marketing and optimization efforts forward. To succeed and thrive in this role, you must possess strong analytical skills, can manage multiple tasks concurrently and have a relentless drive to surpass performance expectations.
 



  





  





 Maya Delorez is an e-commerce company targeting a global market, which requires you to adapt your approach to different markets. Combining SEM and SEO, the role presents a dynamic work environment with substantial responsibilities, offering abundant chances for you to innovate and influence outcomes.
 



  





  





**Your responsibilities will include:** 




 As our Search Engine Marketer, you are responsible for setting the strategy for Maya Delorez’s SEO and SEM work and making sure it aligns with the brand’s goals and vision. To proactively identify growth opportunities, enhance campaign performance, and stay updated on industry news, you continuously monitor the market and competitors. Additionally, you collaborate with other teams within the company to design ads, campaigns, and website materials.
 



  





  





**SEM** 



* Monitor SEM-related KPIs and develop and implement effective strategies for different markets based on the results.
* Analyze campaign outcomes and deliver internal insight reports with actionable recommendations.
* Continuously optimize, develop, and track performance on Google Ads across different campaign types including Search, Performance Max, and YouTube. Responsible for reporting and analyzing results.
* Manage, plan, and optimize the account structure.
* Continuous keyword and behavioural analyses.
* Continuously search for growth opportunities, test ideas, and pursue successful initiatives.



  





  





**SEO** 



* Monitor SEO-related KPIs and craft effective strategies tailored to different markets, based on the outcomes
* Perform comprehensive keyword analysis to pinpoint pertinent search terms and emerging trends.
* Optimize
 *mayadelorez.com* 
 to enhance organic visibility and rankings.
* Track rankings for the website across all languages.
* Continuously monitor and analyze performance statistics to ensure the website maintains strong SEO hygiene.



  





  





**What you’ll need:** 



* Fluent in both English and Swedish.
* Experience in SEM and/or SEO, preferably within the e-commerce sector.
* Ability to take initiative and independently advance both SEM and SEO endeavors.
* Some experience in strategic campaign management, analysis, and reporting to evaluate outcomes and provide improvement recommendations
* Motivated by achieving results.
* Ability to think analytically.
* You approach problem-solving with creativity and have a solutions-oriented mindset.



  





  





***Meritorious, but not required:***



* Knowledge of and/or experience in equestrian sports
* Experience in feed optimization
* Experience with Google Analytics and/or Google Tag Manager.
* Hands-on experience with SEO tools such as Google Search Console, Ahrefs, Accuranker and Screaming Frog.
* Understanding of search engine algorithms and best practices in SEO and SEM.
* Previous experience working with other search engines, e.g. Bing.
