title: Lärare (fjärr) i Tagalog som modersmål
description:
Lärare i Modersmål Filippinska Tagalog via fjärrWermteach Fjärrundervisning ABModersmålslärare i grundskolanObestämd ortKorta fakta om jobbet
 
  





  





  





 Anställningsform: Behovsanställning
 


 KvalifikationerArbetslivserfarenhet
 
 Meriterande
 


* Modersmålslärare i grundskolan -
* erfarenhet efterfrågas


 Utbildning
 
 Krav
 


* Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre inom Pedagogik och lärarutbildning


 Språk
 
 Meriterande
 


* Filippinska språk, andra
* Tagalog/Filipino


 Om jobbet
 
 Omfattning är 6-9h i veckan hos mindre kommun.
 



 Är du en engagerad modersmålslärare med passion för att undervisa i Tagalog? Vill du ha friheten att arbeta hemifrån och samtidigt göra en verklig skillnad för elever? Då har vi det perfekta uppdraget för dig!
 



 Om oss:
 



 WermTeach grundades våren 2020 med en tydlig vision: att alla elever ska få undervisning av behöriga lärare och att varje lärare undervisar i sitt ämnesområde. Våra ledord är kvalitet, goda resultat och nytänkande. Vi strävar efter att skapa en modern utbildningsmiljö där både elever och lärare trivs och utvecklas.
 



 Om rollen:
 



 Som webblärare i Tagalog kommer du att:
 


* Undervisa på distans: Planera och genomföra fjärrundervisning
* Vägleda och bedöma: Ge konstruktiv återkoppling och stöd till eleverna genom deras studier. I slutet av varje kurs träffar du dina elever enskilt i ett digitalt mötesrum för att stämma av kunskapsnivån inför betygsättningen.
* Flexibel arbetstid: Anpassa din arbetsdag efter dina behov, med en omfattning på 6-9h i veckan



 Vad vi erbjuder:
 


* Introduktion och stöd: Vid anställning får du en introduktion till arbetet som webblärare. Du har även tillgång till vår IT-support för tekniska frågor.
* Självständigt arbete: Vi söker dig med förmåga till självledarskap, som kan planera din tid och arbeta självständigt.



 Vem är du?
 


* Du är tydlig i din kommunikation, både i tal och skrift.
* Du är strukturerad, självgående och har förmågan att engagera elever på distans.



 Ansökan:
 


* Urval och intervjuer sker löpande
 
 , så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!


 Om anställningenLön
 
 Lönetyp: Fast månads- vecko- eller timlön
 


 Var ligger arbetsplatsen?
 
 Arbetsplatsens ort är obestämd.
 


 Arbetsgivaren
 
 Wermteach Fjärrundervisning AB
 



 http://wermteach.se
 



  




 Sök jobbet
 
 Ansök snarast!
 



 Ange referens Filippinska Tagalog i din ansökan
 


 Ansök via mejl
 
 Mejla din ansökan till
 



 peter.svensson@wermteach.se
 


 Ansök så här
 
 personligt brev och CV

title: Account Manager till växande Elovade
description:
Elovade är ett bolag som strävar efter att tillhandahålla de absolut bästa lösningarna inom IT i syfte att underlätta arbetet och öka lönsamheten hos sina partners. De önskar nu utöka teamet och söker efter en driven och hungrig Account Manager som vill växa in i rollen långsiktigt. Låter detta som någonting för dig? Sök då tjänsten redan idag då vi tillämpar ett löpande urval!
 



  

**Företag :**
 ELOVADE Sverige AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Årsta
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående eller enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Tjänsten som Account Manager på Elovade passar dig som vill ta steget in på ett spännande och växande It-företag. Elovade är en ledande mjukvarudistributör inom IT i Skandinavien, och med mångårig kompetens tillhandahåller dem marknadens smartaste och mest innovativa lösningar exklusivt till IT-Konsulter och interna IT-avdelningar. På Elovade får du möjlighet att jobba på ett bolag som är specialiserade inom IT-baserade affärs- och verksamhetslösningar med fokus på drift, övervakning och automatisering.
 


  


 Som Account Manager hos Elovade får du möjligheten att utveckla din kompetens inom området samt bli en del av ett företag där tekniken ligger i framkant. Du erbjuds även ett flexibelt arbete med möjlighet till distansarbete samt frihet under ansvar. Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Academic Work men du kommer att anställas direkt hos Elovade. I rollen kommer du främst att arbeta med försäljning på ett relationskapande sätt, med främst nya kunder. På sikt förväntas du ha god förståelse för Elovades tjänster, och då är det viktigt att du informerar och säljer in nya idéer till dina kunder samt att du agerar rådgivande vid diverse frågor. Ett axplock av dina ansvarsområden:
 


  

  
* Prospektering genom att söka upp och kontakta nya företag genom kalla samtal
  
* Identifiera kundbehov och affärsmöjligheter
  
* Genom virtuella webbmöten med dina kunder utför du gedigna behovsanalyser, bygger relationer och är en god ambassadör för Elovades varumärke
  
* Jobba mot personligt uppsatta säljmål
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Antingen har
   

**minst två års sammanhängande erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning inom IT**
 , eller dig som har
   

**längre erfarenhet av försäljning**
 där arbetsuppgifter som prospektering, nykundsbearbetning och kalla samtal har ingått. Önskvärt har du sålt mot IT-chefer/IT-avdelningar.
  
* Är flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift, då arbetet utförs på båda språken dagligen.
  


  


  

**I den här rekryteringen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och de kompetenser vi söker hos dig är:**



  

  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Social
  
* Stabil
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work. Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**ELOVADE Sverige AB**

 Läs mer om Elovade HÄR
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till ELOVADE Sverige AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Sophie Markström eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106363

title: Key Account Manager
description:
Vi växer och söker nu ytterligare en säljkollega.
 



  





 Söker du en spännande säljutmaning i ett stabilt, växande bolag med högt i tak och snabba beslutsvägar? Gillar du teknik och har förmåga att bygga långsiktiga relationer? Är du en driven säljare som älskar att vara ute hos kund och hitta nya affärsmöjligheter? Då kanske det här är jobbet för dig!
 



  





 Vi söker ytterligare en erfaren Kundansvarig säljare som vill jobba med nykundsförsäljning, prospektering och att vidareutveckla affärsrelationen med befintliga kunder.
 



 I rollen som Kundansvarig säljare är du en viktig person i Dokumenteras fortsatta utveckling. Vår kundbas består av både stora, väletablerade företag och mindre, mer nischade företag i spännande branscher. Som stöd har du övriga säljteamet samt en konsultchef som bistår med konsultstöd och rekrytering.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder dig en stimulerande miljö där du får utvecklas som säljare och person med våra kunder, vårt duktiga säljteam och våra proffsiga och kunniga konsulter. Du får en unik inblick i många olika typer av verksamheter i olika branscher och möjlighet till stort lärande. Du jobbar i ett drivet säljteam där laget går före jaget. Vi vill utvecklas med dina idéer och erfarenheter och jobbar hela tiden på att bli lite bättre. Som konsultbolag lägger vi mycket kraft på att få alla att trivas och utvecklas och vi har en härlig stämning bland våra medarbetare.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av företagsförsäljning, gärna idéförsäljning, och från konsultverksamhet. Du har mycket energi, är uthållig och tvekar inte att lyfta luren. Våra bästa affärer jobbar vi upp själva, från första samtalet. Du älskar säljhantverket och att ha ansvar för affären från ax till limpa. Det underlättar om du har relevant erfarenhet från olika branscher i näringslivet, gärna från el/energi/anläggning, infrastruktur eller liknande. Erfarenhet inom offentlig upphandling är ett plus. Du behöver också ha en god kunskap/erfarenhet inom teknik/IT.
 



  





 För att trivas hos oss behöver du vara prestigelös, flexibel och villig att lära nytt. Du drar dig inte för att kavla upp ärmarna och få jobbet gjort. Självfallet är du lyhörd och bra på att kommunicera. Du är resultatorienterad, ansvarstagande och samarbetsorienterad. Hos oss går laget före jaget.
 



  





 Känner du igen dig i beskrivningen? Sök redan idag eller slå en signal till Henrik Rehmberg på 0709-727 337 om du vill veta mer om tjänsten. Vi rekryterar löpande. Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Channel Marketing Lead till Samsung
description:
**You will be responsible for:** 



* Creating marketing business planning with key partners in partnership with Key Account Managers for selected customers (resellers and customers)
* Optimizing Samsung brand presence with reseller; ATL, BTL, CRM, homepage and in-store with dedicated customers for our products within MX Division; Smartphone & Connected Devices.
* Be responsible for marketing business planning with key operators and customers: yearly, quarterly channel and monthly activation planning with customer and sales.
* Be responsible for understanding the business strategy for the given customers and operators as well as key consumer and shopper strategies.
* Together with sales set the omni-channel strategy and secure best presence and mix of activation for given product groups and customers. Ownership of Samsung branded presence online and in-store in given reseller.
* Planning of fixed installations, as well as secure share of voice for branded retail, as well as ROI.
* Work with MX teams and organize and execute work needed to reach existing and new customers.



  





 The Channel Marketing Lead will be responsible for channel marketing and sales driven activation as well as for bringing concepts to the major sales channels. This includes responsibility for ensuring sell-through activation in the channels/stores where Samsung products are represented and sold.
 



 Co-hosted events are other areas where the CML will be responsible for planning and execution.
 



  
 



**Qualifications and Experience:** 



* University degree within marketing and communication.
* Fluent in Swedish & English, both verbally and written.
* Minimum 3 years’ of experience within Customer/Channel Marketing roles measured on sell-out growth
* Media and customer campaign planning experience
* B2C experience is a merit
* Customer joint sell-out 360 planning, execution & review
* Customer channel integration & sales maximization
* ROI understanding
* Experience from local media landscape
* Understanding of local consumer journey Traffic generation/conversion driven marketing experience
* Branded Retail development experience



  
 



 Samsung is a highly dynamic company in a fast-moving industry, so there are many opportunities to grow and develop! In order to enjoy working with us you must be a doer and a person who appreciate tempo, change and take own initiatives. You need to be open to new ideas and new ways of thinking. No day is like the other here at Samsung, and we want you to be curious, to see the opportunity in fast and sometimes unexpected changes.
 



 Samsung Nordics is a multicultural company with people from all over the world. This is one of our greatest strengths since it makes us a team with very varied knowledge and experiences. But despite our differences, we all have one thing in common – and that is our pursuit for innovation. We work to address some of the issues that society faces in the Nordics, and we believe that our innovative technology can be a force of good helping us with this.

title: Channel Marketing Lead to Samsung Mobile
description:
At Samsung, they are driven by an unyielding passion for excellence and a commitment to delivering the best products and services in the market. In a fast-paced global economy where change is constant, innovation is crucial. For over 70 years, we’ve set our sights on the future, anticipating market needs and creating long-term success. Now, they looking for a Channel Marketing Lead to ensure they stay ahead of the competition and continue to simplify and enrich consumers’ lives.
   

  

**Your Role**
 As a Channel Marketing Lead, you will be pivotal in shaping Samsung’s brand presence and driving growth across our key partners and resellers. Your responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Marketing Business Planning: Collaborate with Key Account Managers to create marketing strategies for selected customers (resellers and operators).
* Brand Optimization: Enhance Samsung’s brand visibility across ATL, BTL, CRM, homepage, and in-store for smartphones and connected devices within the MX Division.
* Omni-Channel Strategy: Develop an omni-channel strategy with sales teams, ensuring best-in-class brand presence and activation across online and in-store channels.
* Customer-Centric Marketing: Align marketing strategies with key consumer insights and shopper behaviors for resellers and operators.
* Retail Execution: Plan and manage branded retail installations, events, and activations, ensuring maximum ROI and market presence.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with MX teams to drive business results and expand Samsung’s reach to new and existing customers.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead channel marketing and sales-driven activations.
* Drive concepts into major sales channels and ensure sell-through in all represented stores.
* Co-host events and oversee planning and execution with key partners.


**Qualifications**
* University degree in Marketing, Communications, or related fields.
* Fluent in Swedish & English (spoken and written).
* Minimum 3 years of experience in Customer/Channel Marketing roles, with measurable success in sell-out growth.
* Strong experience in media and campaign planning.
* Experience with B2C marketing is a merit.
* Expertise in customer 360° sell-out planning, execution, and review.
* Knowledge of local media and consumer journey.
* Proven success in traffic generation and conversion-driven marketing.
* Experience with branded retail development.


 Why Join Samsung?
   

  

 Samsung is a dynamic company in a fast-moving industry with endless opportunities to grow and develop. We value initiative, creativity, and adaptability—no day is the same! If you thrive in a fast-paced environment where change is constant and innovation is key, you’ll love it here.
   

  

**About The Assignment, We Prefer Project Employment**
 For this assignment, you will be hired as a consultant by HIROY. We offer our consultants a generous package, and you will also become a part of our extensive network of agencies. This will provide you with the opportunity to deploy your skills and interact with our network of consultants.
   

  

 We often offer on an ongoing basis. This means that we sometimes remove the assignment from our website earlier than the application deadline. If you are interested in an assignment, we recommend that you apply immediately.
   

  

**Vi har Nordens största utbud av erfarna digitala marknadsförare**
 Vi hjälper kunder som vill utveckla sina digitala kanaler, har ett föränderligt kompetensbehov samt söker 100% flexibla, skalbara och kostnadseffektiva lösningar som de själva kan styra över.

title: Senior Java developer
description:
**Är du en erfaren Javautvecklare som söker nya utmaningar?** 
 Hos B3 Innovation får du möjligheten att arbeta i en miljö där innovation och samarbete står i fokus. Vi söker dig med djup kunskap inom Java och som trivs i en dynamisk och inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

 Din Roll
   

  

 Som Senior Java Developer hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* Utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar.
* Samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter.
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Vi letar efter en person som:
   

  

* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Javautveckling.
* Våra kunder jobbar bl.a. med Kafka, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices och oftast i en CI/CD-miljö. Har du dessutom kunskaper inom Techlead blir vi extra glada!
* Är bekväm med moderna utvecklingsmetoder som Agile och DevOps.
* Har ett öga för detaljer och brinner för att leverera kvalitativa lösningar.


 Varför Innovation?
   

  

* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande Miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och Flexibilitet: Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål.


 Om B3 Innovation
   

  

 B3 Innovation är en del av B3 Consulting Group, en av Sveriges ledande IT-konsultbolag. Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi är verksamma inom många olika branscher t ex media, bank och finans, offentlig sektor, telekom eller e-handel och jobbar tillsammans med att hitta det uppdrag som passar dig bäst! Med andra ord så kan du som Javautvecklare få arbeta med ex att optimera TV-sändningar, utveckla e-handel, hjälpa transporter eller möta utmaningarna inom smarta hem.
   

  

 Ansök Nu!
   

  

 Är du redo att ta nästa steg? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se Hoppas vi hörs!

title: Global Commercial Product Manager - Energy & Guest Room Management
description:
Are you looking for a role in which you can create something new? Vingcard, formerly ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions | Hospitality is looking for our next Product Manager who will support our Business Area globally in shaping strategy around our newly acquired product portfolio, Energy & Guest Room Management.
   

  

 Join the Vingcard Team in this fully remote role and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

**What would you do as our Global Commercial Product Manager - Energy & Guest Room Management**
 To support the growth of Vingcard, we are looking to expand the Product Management Team. Within this newly created position, you will play a key role in defining and executing development strategy of our Energy & Guest Room Management product portfolio, driving the sales of the product internally through increasing knowledge, awareness and customer relevance.
   

  

**You would also:**
* Create and implement a multi-generational product plan with product offering, pricing/margins, channel differentiation and positioning to ensure competitive advantage and profitable growth
* Capture “voice of customer” feedback from customers and key influencers, and translate it into strategy
* Develop and implement business plans to drive improvements in sales within the specific product category
* Collaborate with a variety of internal and external stakeholders


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who:
   

  

* Has strong technical background and ability to understand the product portfolio, gained in a hands-on rnd development role
* Has hands-on experience in a sales role, ideally as within technical sales
* Is able to produce a business plan to support the development of the product and increase sales
* Has excellent English communication skills, written and verbal
* Is able to communicate with various stakeholders at all levels
* Is available to travel globally,  30-50% of the working time


 To succeed in this role, you need to have the ability to understand and capture customer market problems and translate them into market requirements for product development whilst also having a solid commercial background. You are analytical and are able to understand where the focus needs to be to increase market position and drive sales of our product portfolio.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills
* Hybrid model of working
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes
* Flexible working hours
* Stable employment in a friendly international atmosphere


**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here, no later than 30th September 2024.
   

  

  

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Daria Skucha, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at Daria.Skucha@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Senior Product Innovation Manager, Assays
description:
At Cepheid, we are passionate about improving health care through fast, accurate diagnostic testing. Our mission drives us, every moment of every day, as we develop scalable, groundbreaking solutions to solve the world’s most complex health challenges. Our associates are involved in every stage of molecular diagnostics, from ideation to the development and delivery of testing advancements that improve patient outcomes across various settings. As a member of our team, you can make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale, within an environment that fosters career growth and development.
   

  

 Cepheid is proud to work alongside a community of six fellow Danaher Diagnostics companies. Together, we’re working at the pace of change on diagnostic tools that address the world’s biggest health challenges, driven by knowing that behind every test there is a patient waiting.
   

  

 Learn about the Danaher Business System which makes everything possible.
   

  

 The Senior Product Innovation Manager, Assays is responsible for bringing Cepheid’s product vision to life for new product development by translating customer needs into prioritized innovation and technology decisions.
   

  

 The onsite position is part of Global Product Management and will be located in Solna, Stockholm, Sweden. At Cepheid, our vision is to be the leading provider of seamlessly connected diagnostic solutions.
   

  

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**
* Based on customer needs, co-develop and present business cases for New Product Development (NPD) and be a driver of the NPD process by defining market requirements and designing target product profiles.
* Participate in Product Strategy Review (PSR) meetings to present new business cases in collaboration with Product Portfolio teams and align on product strategy and project prioritization.
* Contribute to the Innovation roadmap and maintain Incremental Pipeline Value (IPV,) and Innovation Growth Equation metrics aligned with a multi-year Strategic Plan.
* In collaboration with Product Portfolio teams, gather and represent the voice of customer and the voice of business on NPD core teams and lead market discussions at monthly Product Planning Group (PPG) meetings to assess and manage risks and tradeoffs.
* Establish leadership in cross-functional NPD core teams and ensure adherence to market and product requirements from pre-concept tollgate, through the entire product development cycle.


**The essential requirements of the job include:**
* Bachelor’s degree with 8+ years of related work experience OR Master’s degree in field with 6+ years of related work experience or Doctoral Degree in the field with 3+ years of work experience.
* Demonstrated experience in translating customer needs into product requirements and ensuring product designs meet customer needs.
* Experience in developing and presenting business cases to top management and leadership.
* Role requires frequent travel of up to 30% and may include some international travel.


**It would be a plus if you also** 
**possess previous experience in:**
* Knowledge of the molecular diagnostic testing and instrumentation marketplace is highly desired.
* Strategic marketing and/or product management experience is preferred.
* Communicates effectively and is a strong team player/collaborator with various internal constituents, customers, and other stakeholders.


 Cepheid, a Danaher operating company, offers a broad array of comprehensive, competitive benefit programs that add value to our lives. Whether it’s a health care program or paid time off, our programs contribute to life beyond the job. Check out our benefits at danaherbenefitsinfo.com.
   

  

 At Danaher we bring together science, technology and operational capabilities to accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life. Our global teams are pioneering what’s next across Life Sciences, Diagnostics, Biotechnology and beyond. For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
   

  

 At Danaher, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.

title: Assistant Store Manager i Kungsholmen (Maternity Cover) BOLIA
description:
**Vi drivs av att skapa en utvecklande medarbetarkultur, starka resultat och en speciell kundupplevelse. Låter det som något för dig så letar vi nu efter en Store Manager (Maternity Cover) till vår vackra konceptbutik i Kungsholmen.**
**Om jobbet**
 Som Assistant Store Manager blir du ambassadör för Bolia. Du sätter en stor ära i att erbjuda superbrandservice på butiksgolvet samtidigt som du har förmågan att fungera som en förebild för ditt team. Du leder arbetet och ser till att butiken når sina mål, och dina framgångar avspeglas i dina kollegors framgångar och den höga standarden på butiken, där du har förmågan att driva både försäljning, KPI:er, utbildning och ledning.
   

  

**Dina Uppgifter**
* Säkerställa extraordinära kundupplevelser för alla besökare.
* Säkerställa att både dina egna och teamets försäljningsmål uppfylls.
* Säkerställa optimal bemanningsplanering med SMART Planning
* Säkerställa en inspirerande och välkomnande butik genom implementering av VM-riktlinjer.
* Ledning och planering av alla dagliga rutiner och uppgifter, inklusive försäljnings- och budgetansvar.
* Leda teamet genom att föregå med gott exempel och synlighet.
* Utveckla, motivera och leda dina medarbetare så att de når sina personliga försäljnings- och utvecklingsmål genom månatliga uppföljningsmöten och årliga medarbetarutvecklingssamtal.
* Ansvara för all butiks-HR samt att säkerställa en öppen, vänlig och inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
* Ansvara för att rekrytera nya Bolia-talanger och behålla medarbetare liksom för onboarding och eventuella uppsägningar.
* Utveckling, implementering och uppföljning av kvartalsvisa actionplans.
* Hålla dig själv och teamet uppdaterade när det gäller all information från olika kommunikationsplattformar.


**Dina Kompetenser**
* Du har lång erfarenhet från en ledande befattning, helst inom retail.
* Du har en hands-on-mentalitet och kan gå i täten när det gäller alla typer av uppgifter.
* Du har erfarenhet av att sammanställa och utveckla ett team, och på så vis skapa goda resultat.
* Du är bra på att kommunicera och motivera dina medarbetare
* Du är initiativrik, tar ansvar och arbetar strukturerat.
* Du har god förmåga att planera, genomföra och slutföra uppgifter.
* Du är inte rädd för att delegera, men deltar även gärna själv i uppgiften.
* Du talar och skriver engelska på minst samtalsnivå.
* Du behärskar Office-paketet väl och dina it-kunskaper ligger på hög nivå.
* God it-förståelse är generellt en fördel eftersom vi är ett digitalt företag som använder många olika och komplexa program.


**Bolia som arbetsplats**
 Som Store Manager i en Bolia-butik får du ett inspirerande och meningsfullt jobb med fart och fläkt. Bolia-kulturen bygger på en proaktiv inställning där alla känner sig involverade i processer och beslut – och inte minst inspirerade att ta på sig ansvaret för varandra, våra kunder och världen omkring oss. Som manager på Bolia spelar du en bärande roll för denna kultur.
   

  

 På Bolia arbetar vi efter filosofin ”Always in Beta”. Vi har ambitionen att ta aktiv del i den globala hållbara utvecklingen och samtidigt dela med oss av vår kreativitet och passion för att göra bättre val. Vi älskar att utmana vanor och stagnation genom en strävan att hitta nya vägar som gör oss klokare, bättre, gladare och mer hållbara.
   

  

**Vill du följa med resan?**
 Vi hoppas att du har fått svar på dina frågor, men har du några frågor kvar är du välkommen att kontakta Store Manager på Mail (Maternity Cover). Ladda upp ansökan och CV via länken.
   

  

 Vi håller intervjuer fortlöpande och rekommenderar därför att du skickar in din ansökan redan idag. Platsannonsen tas bort så snart vi har fått in tillräckligt många ansökningar eller när rätt kandidat har hittats. Självklart behandlar vi din ansökan konfidentiellt.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och skapa något alldeles unikt tillsammans.

title: Video Artist (Games)
description:
As a Video Artist at Embark we have a “game first” attitude where our players are our number one priority. To us, it’s important that our trailers represent our games, and it will be part of your job to ensure that! In this role you will work heavily with gameplay material and other in-game content. As with all roles at Embark, it’s important that you are open to new ideas and creative solutions!
   

  

**Example Of Responsibilities**
* Record, edit and polish gameplay material.
* Create in-game content, such as store front images, icons and screenshots.
* End-to-end set up of cinematic scenes with the use of in-engine tools; such as camera animation, lighting, previs and post-production.
* Edit and polish trailers as well as marketing materials.
* Design motion graphics and video transitions.
* Edit footage with post-effects and color-correction.


**It would be awesome if you have**
* A creative and curious mind!
* Relevant professional experience within the game industry and gameplay editing and capturing specifically.
* Estimate tasks and time, update plans, and deliver content to quality according to directions.
* Experience with game engines, knowledge in Unreal Engine is a requirement.
* Knowledge of Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro.
* Extensive knowledge of cinematography and composition.
* Great communication and collaboration skills.
* A strong passion for art, games and relevant technologies.
* Fluency in English.


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: SAP Finance consultant to Accenture’s Nordic SAP Business Group
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Then our roles as SAP Finance consultant in our SAP Business Group are a perfect find for you!
   

  

 Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career. You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
   

  

**About Our Nordic SAP Business Group**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies.
   

  

 Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at candidates for several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects.

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career.

- Rich opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert network and benchmarks.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Utilize your functional and technical expertise in SAP Finance and other, by analyzing, designing, and implementing business processes supported by SAP best practice solutions.

- Utilize your Industry expertise in the field of SAP solutions to deliver client value as a professional individual and as part of a team.

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through SAP transformations.

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Finance Value Tower and contribute to thought leadership, competence development, and sales initiatives.

**SAP Finance Nordic Value Tower**
**Curious colleagues working within SAP Finance - We are a fantastic and diverse Nordic team consisting of around 60 colleagues in 5 countries and we are growing steadily.**
**What do we do?**
 Accenture provides a full range of SAP-based services and solutions for the Finance organization leveraging SAP Financials, which provides a complete financial management solution for a broad range of industries. SAP Financials is the leading enterprise software solution for accounting, financial reporting, performance management, and corporate governance.
   

  

 Our SAP Financials solution helps clients leverage the full range of SAP functionality for finance transformation. These SAP capabilities center around six key components:
   

  

**Financial Accounting & Operations (covering FI module, Real Estate and Travel Management)**
 Optimize our client's accounting processes based on the implementation and/or the upgrade of the SAP FI module
   

  

**Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) (covering CO module and SEM / Business Objects)** 
 Ensures that our clients can significantly measure and drive value from the planning and control cycle
   

  

**Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) Financials**
 Maximize the return on our client's investment, project and asset management processes
   

  

**Treasury and Financial Supply Chain Management (FSCM)** 
 Significantly improve effectiveness and efficiency of our client's treasury operations, safeguard their liquidity and ensure that financial risks are both identified and effectively managed
   

  

**Industry Specific Financials** 
 Implement specialized SAP functionality to support clients in industries with highly specialized financial accounting and processing requirements such as insurance, utilities and the public sector
   

  

**Governance Risk and Compliance (GRC)** 
 Combines profit-driven business concepts with new SAP technology to increase compliance efficiency and bring profitable insights into core business processes
   

  

**Required Qualifications**
- Several years of hands-on SAP experience in an onshore project role preferably in the Nordics)

- Hands on Finance experience from S/4HANA Finance solutions

- Good understanding of Finance process and their business value drivers

- Strong resonance with Accenture values

- Willingness and ability to quickly learn new concepts and technologies

- Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment

- Motivated, persistent, eager to optimize, drive for excellence

- Passionate about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source, and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner

- A Bachelor/Master’s degree

- We recruit at different levels. For manager level and above, we would like you to see having at least 7 years of relevant project experience as well as having led a team, and ideally also some earlier involvement in the acquisition of new projects .

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience in at least one S/4HANA or SAP Finance project work

- An SAP certification in relevant area

- Experience of the full lifecycle including estimating, planning, and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, or Finnish) language spoken

**Location**
**Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö**
 Equal is greater than - Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from a diverse group of backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation, and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!
   

  

 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: Spontanansökan: Extrajobb för student inom samhällsplanering
description:
**Vi tar emot spontansökningar från studenter inom samhällsplanering, stadsbyggnad eller liknande som söker ett roligt och givande extrajobb som guide hos våra kunder i Stockholm. Vi rekryterar för tjänsten några gånger per termin.**
**Om uppdraget**
 Ett extrajobb för studenter inom samhällsplanering och stadsbyggnad som guide hos någon av våra välkända kunder i Stockholm. Det är ett flexibelt extrajobb under både vardagar och helger och arbetstiderna varierar. Vi ser att du kan arbeta minst 1-2 dagar i veckan och du bestämmer själva vilka dagar du finns tillgänglig för arbete.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
* Ta emot och guida besökare
* Svara på frågor och informera om olika samhällsprojekt
* Vid behov hålla presentationer för specifika grupper av besökare som är inbokade.


**Dina kvalifikationer**
* Du studerar samhällsplanering eller stadsbyggnad på universitetsnivå
* Du kan kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska
* Goda kunskaper i Microsoft Office-paketet
* Kunna arbeta minst 1-2 dagar/vecka
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet från serviceyrke


**Om ansökan**
 Skicka in en spontansökan inför framtida rekryteringsprocesser för denna tjänst genom att klicka på ansök nedan.
   

  

 Vi tar inte emot spontanansökningar via mejl, har du däremot frågor går det bra att vända sig till vikarie@bemannia.se alternativt 08-122 00 450 under kontorstid.
   

  

 Bemannia är ett publikt och svenskägt bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag som tillhandahåller kompetent och kvalificerad personal genom uthyrning, rekrytering och personalentreprenader inom Organisation & Ledarskap, PR & Information, Marknad & Sälj, Ekonomi, Juridik, HR & Personal, Fastighet & Teknik, IT & Data samt Kontor & Administration. Bemannia har ramavtal med merparten av Sveriges Myndigheter och Sveriges kommuner, dess förvaltningar och bolag. Bemannia är medlem i Kompetensföretagen och är ett auktoriserat Bemanningsföretag och Rekryteringsföretag samt har kollektivavtal med Unionen, Akademikerna, SEKO samt LO och Hotell- och Restauranganställdas förbund. Bemannia är certifierat enligt SS-EN ISO 9001:2015, Ledningssystem för kvalitet, SS-EN ISO 14001:2015, Miljöledningssystem – krav och vägledning, SS-ISO 45001:2018, Ledningssystem för arbetsmiljö och SS-ISO/IEC 27001:2013 Ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet
   

  

 Ledningen för bolaget har varit verksam i branschen i 40 år.

title: Business Development Intern
description:
Digisource Consulting AB is a young and innovation-driven software solutions and IT consulting company based in Stockholm. Our goal for digital transformation is to leverage the power of digital technologies to transform and improve the way businesses operate, deliver value to customers, and achieve strategic objectives. We strive to create new business models, better service levels & higher competitiveness, increase internal collaboration, optimized processes, increased efficiency, and improved employee performance & compliance with data security.
 



  





 Innovation drives Digisource and we have adopted People, Process, and Technology as the cornerstones of our digital transformation. Our solutions portfolio include Gen AI, Cloud, CRM, HCM, mobility solutions, application development and management. We have successfully developed and taken to market an AI-driven
 
 SaaS
 
 HCM which was ranked as one of the top ten HR tech start-up products.
 



 ​
 



 We are bold and confident to confront existing solutions and try out new ideas to evaluate future potential. We believe that technology works to achieve business goals. We work closely with our customers to understand their business goals first and then map them to an appropriate solution. 
 



  





 We are currently looking for business development interns to spur our growth. This internship is an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in sales and marketing. Your responsibilities will include customer reach out through social media marketing, Lead generation and pre-sales activities. The internship is for the period September -December 2024.
 



  





 We are looking for a self-starter with lots of energy, a positive outlook, good communicator and ability to think out of the box on their feet. You will have access to multiple digital tools in the business development process. This internship will get you up and ready as an efficient sales and marketing professional.
 



  





 You will provided with a thorough knowledge transfer about our solutions. You will gain a hands-on understanding of solutions in our portfolio and get an opportunity to step up as a solution or sales specialist.
 



  





 The ideal candidate is someone who enjoys communication, has an interest in the digital transformation, loves challenges, and is motivated. Fluency in Swedish and English ( written and spoken) is a must.
 



  





 The internship has a performance-based allowance.

title: SEB LC&FI Summer Internship 2025 – Quantitative analyst within Fixed Income in Stockholm
description:
SEB’s division Large Corporates and Financial Institutions (LC&FI) offers talented students an exciting opportunity to work with banking and finance for a few intense summer months. If you have the ambition, we will support you in growing your potential at SEB this summer!
   

  

**About The Internship**
 Your internship starts off with an introduction week where you get to know SEB as an employer but also LC&FI as a division. During the introduction you will meet representatives from the division and participate in learning and networking activities. We end the internship with a closing day where we catch up and share about your experience. As an intern, you are recruited to a specific job role where you will be involved in daily business activities and have a great opportunity to explore the environment of banking. You will be guided by at least one tutor during the internship. For more details visit our webpage here .
   

  

**About The Position**
 You will be joining a team of Quantitative analysts and be based in Stockholm. The Fixed Income Quant team is responsible for the pricing and risk models for all fixed income products including XVA, as well as the trading algorithms used for trade execution, market making and risk management. Among other tasks, you will for example be introduced to and involved in development of tools for pricing, P&L and risk of fixed income and interest derivative products and take part in the building of the fixed income platform for Trading. This includes analysis, configuration, implementation and testing of valuation models, yield curves or volatility surfaces, as well as supporting Sales and Trading with ad-hoc analyses on an intra-day basis.
   

  

 Not only will you be part of a talented and diverse team of quantitative analysts, you will also work closely with all parts of the Fixed Income organization including Sales and Trading.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You do likely have an ongoing M Sc. in a relevant field of study, for example Mathematics, Engineering, Physics or Data science. Also, we see that you have skills within coding and are fluent in both written and spoken English. Experience with financial markets with knowledge of trading fixed income and interest rate derivative products is considered a plus.
   

  

 As a person, you are motivated by working in a fast paced and dynamic environment where you can make a difference with your analytical skills. You are a team player who enjoy working as part of a team, have good communication skills, and have the ability to work under pressure.
   

  

**About**
**Learn more about working at SEB www.sebgroup.com/career**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
 Attach your CV and a cover letter describing yourself and your motivation for this position. We are selecting candidates continuously, so please apply as soon as possible, but no later than October 9th, 2024 at 23:59 CET. If you have questions about the position, you can reach out to Morten Karlsmark at morten.karlsmark@seb.se .

title: SEB LC&FI Summer Internship 2025 - Quantitative analyst within FX Trading in Stockholm
description:
SEB’s division Large Corporates and Financial Institutions(LC&FI) offers talented students an exciting opportunity to work with banking and finance for a few intense summer months. If you have the ambition, we will support you in growing your potential at SEB this summer!
   

  

**The internship in short**
 Your internship starts off with an introduction week where you get to know SEB as an employer but also LC&FI as a division. During the introduction you will meet representatives from the division and participate in learning and networking activities. We end the internship with a closing day where we catch up and share about your experience. As an intern, you are recruited to a specific job role where you will be involved in daily business activities and have a great opportunity to explore the environment of banking. **About The Position**
 You will be a joining a team of Traders and Quantitative analysts and be based in Stockholm.  You dolikely have an ongoing M Sc. in a relevant field of study, for example Mathematics, Engineering, Physics or Data science. Also, we see that you have skills within coding and are fluent in both written and spoken English. Experience from electronic FX trading is meriting although not required.
   

  

 As a person, you are motivated by working in a fast paced and dynamic environment where you can make a difference with your analytical skills. You are a team player who enjoy working as part of a team, have good communication skills, and have the ability to work under pressure.
   

  

**Learn More About Working At SEB Www.sebgroup.com/career**

If you have questions about the position, please contact Simon Österberg (Chief Quantitative Trader, FX) at +46 (0)76 043 75 79 or simon.osterberg@seb.se .

title: SEB LC&FI Summer Internship 2025 – Fixed Income Sales in Stockholm
description:
SEB’s division Large Corporates and Financial Institutions (LC&FI) offers talented students an exciting opportunity to work with banking and finance for a few intense summer months. If you have the ambition, we will support you in growing your potential at SEB this summer!
   

  

**About The Internship**
 Your internship starts off with an introduction week where you get to know SEB as an employer but also LC&FI as a division. During the introduction you will meet representatives from the division and participate in learning and networking activities. We end the internship with a closing day where we catch up and share about your experience. As an intern, you are recruited to a specific job role where you will be involved in daily business activities and have a great opportunity to explore the environment of banking. You will be guided by at least one tutor during the internship. For more details visit our webpage here .
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 Fixed Income Sales is servicing both the domestic and the international institutional client base within SEB FICC Markets. We aid clients with investment advice, market analysis as well as facilitating the trading of bonds and derivatives.
   

  

 During the internship you will support senior colleagues with important analysis and preparatory work, provide trading assistance, produce sales material, excel modelling as well as deepening your knowledge about sustainable banking and learn how we implement it in our daily work.
   

  

 Also, you will be analyzing the macroeconomic development and learn how to use our product offering to help clients to manage their risks. As collaboration is key for the success of our business, you will also have the opportunity to start building a professional network within the whole SEB FICC Markets department and learn how different parts integrate with each other.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You are a highly motivated person with a genuine interest in financial markets. We also believe that you a strong analytical and curious mindset, who pays attention to details, enjoys collaboration and a has a “can-do” attitude”.
   

  

 This job is client centric and therefore requires that you have excellent verbal and written communication skills as well as fluent in Swedish and English.
   

  

 We are also very interested in your personal qualities, outside interests and achievements outside university that gives us an idea who you are and what you can bring to the team.
   

  

**Learn More About Working At SEB Www.sebgroup.com/career**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
