title: CIS Sales Director
description:
Role – Practice Engagement Director(Cloud Infrastructure & Security Services)
  
Technology – Sales Execution
  
Location – Sweden
  
What will you do?
  
As a Practice Engagement Manager/Director focusing on Cloud Infrastructure and Security services across industry segments in Europe, the job needs to fulfil the following KPIs:
  
Driving and increasing revenues of Infosys by developing winning strategies to engage Client in a consultative manner, by positioning solutions, capabilities, and IP of the organization in the area of datacenter consolidation, hybrid cloud transformation, public cloud migration, modern workplace transformation, software defined networks, cyber threat analytics and next generation SRE operations.
  
Candidate should demonstrate a practitioner articulation of industry trends in these areas, key tenets and metrics that will address the client challenges and ability to lead Client CXO / IT leadership conversations to help develop a strong business case, in consultation and collaboration with the diverse technology teams in a global organization.
  
Growing a profitable pipeline and/or backlog of sales, through deal origination, sales negotiations and closure by:
  
Collecting ground level intelligence on client drivers and competitor moves, form "Pursuit Teams" across Business Units (as applicable) and drive consensus on pricing (including revenue transfer)
  
Recommending and defending win-price at the appropriate levels and procure all approvals
  
Positioning client-facing team, explain client context, coach pursuit team and drive among BUs
  
Clarifying client expectations and ratify the solution with client
  
Handling customer complaints about project executions across IBU (Industry Business Units) delivery and HBUs (Horizontal Business Units) , as well as negotiations on MSAs and SOWs (which the Commercial Manager leads)
  
Facilitating the discussion for the commercial manager and be the point-of-escalation if needed
  
Anchoring meetings and closing any opportunities generated for Cloud Infrastructure, Security (CIS) and partnering / ensuring active participation from partners concerned (as applicable – based on the gamut of CIS Service portfolio of Infosys)
  
Demonstrating that Infosys is the best Systems Integrator for implementing IT transformation solutions in any client context
  
  

Required Professional Skills
  
Extensive years of experience in IT services, business development / sales.
  
Strong / Specialized experience in selling Cloud Infrastructure, Security Services and Solutions to European clients
  
Strong knowledge of technology, methodologies and tools or technology practitioner knowledge in at least a few relevant technologies and tools in order to recommend frameworks like datacenter consolidation, hybrid cloud transformation, public cloud migration, modern workplace transformation, software defined networks, cyber threat analytics and next generation SRE operations that can be used for solution creation.
  
Experience in transition, transformation program management and organization change management methodologies and framework and shaping and leading client conversations to prepare for a large, multi-pronged transformation program.
  
Strong understanding of technology partner ecosystem and experience in nurturing, leading vendor alliances and joint solutions both in a pursuit as well as generating proactive pipeline
  
Strong knowledge of Contracting / Legal / MSA (Master Services Agreement) processes and financial concepts to ensure adherence to standards and to make recommendations on the optimal way to structure / price deal and take to a closure.
  
Deep understanding of internal Infosys organization and support structure to ensure relevant approvals and compliance procedures related to pricing as well as legal aspects of a deal
  
Proven strength in relationship-building at senior executive/CxO level
  
Good inter-personal skills including ability to work successfully with virtual, geographically dispersed, and multi-cultural teams
  
Display good ability to relate, compare, secure relevant information and identify key issues and an ability to commit to an action after developing alternative courses of action that take into consideration resources, constraints, and organizational values.
  
Displays an in-depth knowledge of value articulation principles including client ROI and appropriate storyboarding techniques to be able to present the Infosys solution effectively to the relevant stakeholders.
  
  

About Us
  
Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over four decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.
  
  

Infosys provides equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race; Color; six; gender identity; sexual orientation; religious practices and observances; national origin; pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions; status as a protected veteran or spouse/family member of a protected veteran; or disability.
company_description: Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 56 countries to navigate their digital transformation.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
Date: Sep 16, 2024
Location:
SE
At Bluebeam, we empower people to advance the way the world is built. We create smart software solutions that make construction sites more efficient, connected and safe and improve the lives of design and construction professionals everywhere.

  


The **Technical Support Specialist**, a mid-level software support position, is expected to assist Bluebeam customers via telephone and email who are having technical challenges installing, configuring and using our products. It is essential that the Technical Support Specialist partner with the customer at a professional level, provide effective resources or solutions within a reasonable amount of time, and contribute regularly to the general improvement of the team and the customer experience.

  


**About the Role**


* Masters the Bluebeam voice to deliver an extraordinary experience to customers by answering telephone calls and emails, managing expectations and setting boundaries.
* Researches questions troubleshoot issues related to the use of Bluebeam software applications, including plugins into other software applications.
* Captures detailed call log notes and accurate case details to categorize issue types and case reasons appropriately, including feedback and case status/solution.
* Becomes familiar with AEC industry workflows and terminology, software best practices and 3rd party applications to manage expectations and advise customers on software workflows and best practices, helping them achieve the desired result with Bluebeam solutions.
* Learns and applies KCS Methodologies for each customer interaction by attaching, creating or updating knowledge articles on all cases.
* Demonstrates strong prioritization, time and task management skills to manage the daily workload that involves scheduled phone queue coverage, email cases, KCS documentation, bug logging and other tasks as assigned.
* Demonstrates professional maturity, accountability, take initiative and be consistently reliable.
* Acts as an advocate for the customer and effectively communicate feedback to and from the members of different internal teams in a clear and concise manner.

  




**About You**


* 2+ years of technical support experience, pererbaly software/business application support
* Strong troubleshooting/problem solving skills: Ability to understand the question/issue, identify knowns, unknowns and apply product and environmental (e.g. Windows Operating System) knowledge to ask qualifying questions to determine appropriate troubleshooting steps to move towards and achieve resolution.
* Customer service skills. Bluebeam has exceptional standards for customer service, not only for the clients we support, but also for our employees. It is our expectation that the person in this role will like to work with others and will help them solve problems with a positive attitude and helpful spirit.
* Solid understanding of Microsoft Windows operating systems (Windows 10, 11) i.e. installing and uninstalling programs and drivers
* A positive and proactive nature.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal


**Extras:**


* A+ or Microsoft IT Certification (i.e. MTA)
* Experience with PDF software
* Experience with architectural or structural programs such as AutoCAD, Revit, Navisworks, Tekla or SolidWorks
* Experience working within the AEC (Architectural, Engineering, and Construction) industry
* Experience working with mobile platforms
* Experience working with virtual environments (i.e. Citrix, VMware, Hyper-V)
* Experience in setting up and utilizing software deployment tools
* Experience with Knowledge Centered Service (KCS) is a plus

  




**What we offer**


* People-focused, entrepreneurial culture with the backing of a stable, global, corporate entity – Nemetschek
* Competitive compensation and benefits package
* Work-life balance fostered through a culture of diversity, inclusion, and appreciation of individual lifestyle needs
* Opportunity for continuous professional development
	+ Free & unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning
	+ Up to $5K annual education reimbursement (after 1 year tenure)

**Below is our DEIBA (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, Belonging, and Accessibility) mission statement:**


Bluebeam is committed to building an inclusive environment in which everyone, regardless of background, has an opportunity to experience a deep sense of belonging. Each of our unique perspectives amplifies our collective power, and by encouraging diverse perspectives in an environment infused with mutual respect, we arrive at better solutions. And when we bring the best version of ourselves to work, we can make our best contributions to the global community of people who build our world.  



**About Bluebeam**


The construction industry is adopting new technology at a feverish pace. Tablets and cell phones are replacing paper blueprints, drones are surveying jobsites in 3D, and cloud collaboration is changing the way teams work together. Bluebeam plays a crucial role in this transformation. The key to our success is a customer-focused approach to product development: we work with the industry to create solutions for the industry. Today, over 3 million people throughout the world use Bluebeam. In the US, we’re a critical partner for the majority of top AEC firms, and rapidly expanding our presence globally, with offices in Sweden, Germany and the UK.


Come design and build your future with us!

  


***Bluebeam is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, gender, gender identity, parental or pregnancy status, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or veteran status.***

  


#LI-MB1


#Bluebeam
company_description: Since 2002, Bluebeam, Inc. has been at the forefront of the digital revolution in construction technology. Today, over 3 million people in 160+ countries use Bluebeam software to mark up, collaborate

title: SAP Engagement Manager, Malmö
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**Join our expanding NORDIC PBS Team and help leading organizations unlock the value of technology. As a leader in the industry, we work with top-tier clients across various sectors to deliver transformative SAP solutions that enable businesses to achieve their strategic goals. Our team is composed of passionate professionals who are committed to making a difference, and we are now looking to expand our team in Sweden.**  

  

**We are seeking a dynamic and experienced SAP Engagement Manager to join our PBS team in Malmö. As an SAP Engagement Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing client engagements, ensuring successful delivery of SAP projects, and building strong, long-lasting relationships with our clients.**  

  

**Do you want to make a significant impact and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment with well-known customers this could be the role for you.**  



**YOUR ROLE**  



* **Understanding client's needs, aligning project objectives with company goals, and ensuring the successful completion of the project at hand.**
* **Lead SAP implementation projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.**
* **Play a central role in building, maintaining and enhancing client relationships.**
* **Working collaboratively with solution architects and technical consultants for preparing appropriate response to RFP documents.**
* **Identify and mitigate risks associated with project delivery, ensuring smooth execution and client satisfaction.**
* **Drive process improvements and share best practices across the PBS team to enhance overall service delivery.**

**YOUR PROFILE**  



* **Minimum 5 years of experience in SAP project management with good delivery or pre-sales background having demonstrated experience in managing projects.**
* **Strong understanding of SAP solutions and proven ability to manage complex projects and lead cross-functional teams.**
* **Ability to respond to RFP and estimation capabilities.**
* **Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients and team members.**

  

**WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT WORKING HERE:**  



* **A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training and a global network of experts.**
* **Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.**
* **A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.**
* **A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.**
* **An innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.**  

  

  

***Apply Now and Transform Your Career with Capgemini!***

It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**

description:

The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of SAP modules and extensive experience with SAP S/4HANA implementations. As an SAP Solution Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing integrated SAP solutions that meet our clients' business needs.**  

  

**If you are looking for a challenging career, working in a global environment with well-known customers this could be the role for you.**

* **Lead the design, architecture, and implementation of SAP solutions across various modules, ensuring alignment with business goals and best practices.**

* **Conduct system assessments and recommend improvements to optimize performance, scalability, and efficiency.**

title: Projektledare IT (Göteborg)
description:
**Är du en IT-projektledare som motiveras av att driva värdeskapande förändring genom smart systemlösningar? Har du dessutom erfarenhet från agila organisationer? Då kan du bli vår nästa projektledare i team cloud and custom applications (C&CA) på Capgemini i Göteborg!**  

  

**OM ROLLEN:**

**Vi befinner oss i en ständig utvecklingsresa tillsammans med våra kunder och behöver därför utöka teamet som driver det viktiga arbetet framåt. Vi tror att du brinner för IT såväl som affärsutveckling där vi stöttar våra kunder i deras digitala transformation och hållbarhetsutveckling. Som projektledare kommer du att verka på såväl organisations- som team-nivå med fokus på att förstå affärsbehoven och verksamheten samt driva värdeskapande förändring. Som projektledare hos oss trivs du i en föränderlig miljö där du leder leveransteam inom digital utveckling och ansvarar för uppbyggnad av team.**

**Projekten kan exemeplvis vara inom följande områden:**  



* **Systemutvecklingsprojekt av skräddarsydda lösningar baserat på olika teknologier och plattformar**
* **Realisera en förbättrad kundupplevelse i olika digitala kanaler**
* **Leda applikationsförvaltningsåtaganden eller annan typ av IT-service**
* **Utrullning av befintliga plattformar**

  

**DIN PROFIL:**

* **Fem till sju års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta som projektledare/serviceledare inom systemutveckling**
* **Erfarenhet av att leda och arbeta i agila utvecklingsteam**
* **Obehindrade kunskaper inom svenska samt engelska**
* **Bakgrund inom systemutveckling alternativt på annat sätt kan påvisa en djup teknisk förståelse**

  

  

**Erfarenhet/kunskap som anses meriterande för denna roll:**

* **Erfarenhet från offentlig sektor**
* **Erfarenhet från logistiksektor**
* **ITIL-processer**

  

**ANSÖKAN:**  

**Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, vi går igenom inkomna ansökningar löpande.**

#### 
**Om Capgemini:**

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.**  



**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

title: Integration Specialist
description:
***Vi befinner oss vid startpunkten för en spännande tillväxtresa. Med sikte på att nå nya marknader och höja våra insatser ytterligare, söker vi dig som är integrationsspecialist och som vill växa med oss. Välkommen till vårt dynamiska team – där din karriärutveckling är lika central som vår gemensamma framgång!***

  

**OM ROLLEN**  

**Vill du vara med och skapa framtidens digitala lösningar? Som Integrationsspecialist (antingen som utvecklare eller arkitekt beroende på vem du är) med fokus på integration kommer du att vara en nyckelspelare i att designa, implementera och underhålla innovativa integrationslösningar som förverkligar våra kunders digitala visioner.**  

  

**Hos oss är flexibilitet och balans en självklarhet. Våra Integration team är baserade i Malmö och Helsingborg, men du har friheten att välja var du arbetar bäst – hemifrån eller på kontoret. I våra team ingår cirka 45 engagerade utvecklare och specialister som arbetar med tekniker som bla. Java, Spring Boot, Mulesoft, Boomi, Kafka och Cloud (GCP, AWS). Vi erbjuder dig stora möjligheter att växa och utvecklas, både genom spännande projekt, samarbete med kollegor över hela världen, och utbildningar som tar din kompetens till nästa nivå.**  

  

**Här får du inte bara en karriär, utan en plats där du kan blomstra och vara med och forma framtiden. Är du redo att ta nästa steg med oss?**

  

**DIN PROFIL**  

**Om du tycker att ovanstående beskrivning är spännande, letar vi efter dig som har:**

* **Flera års erfarenhet inom integrationsutveckling (tex: Mulesoft, Boomi, SOA, OSB eller Kafka)**
* **Erfarenhet inom GCP, AWS eller Azure**
* **Familjär att arbeta i agila team och moderna utvecklingsmiljöer**
* **Flytande kunskaper i Svenska och Engelska**

  

**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**  

**Här hos oss får du inte bara tillgång till den senaste tekniken – du får också en unik möjlighet att utvecklas i din karriär. Vi tror på att ge våra teammedlemmar bästa möjliga möjligheter att lyckas. Därför erbjuder vi skräddarsydd kompetensutveckling, kostnadsfria certifieringar, och chansen att arbeta med spännande kunduppdrag i några av Sveriges största företag.**  

  

**Som integrationsutvecklare får du möjlighet att arbeta med banbrytande teknologier som EDT, ETL, API, MuleSoft, Boomi, Kafka och Big Data. Du kommer att vara involverad i varje steg i leveransprocessen för systemintegration, från början till slut.**  

  

**Samtidigt som vi tar vårt arbete på allvar vet vi också hur man har roligt. Vi anordnar regelbundna evenemang tex: delaktighet i vår konstklubb, sportaktiviteter, fika eller gemensamma AW:s. Vi erbjuder också en rad hälsoförmåner, såsom cykeluthyrning och generösa bidrag för aktiviteter som klättring, dans, massage och gymmedlemskap. Vi är anslutna till kollektivavtal och erbjuder självklart en konkurrensmässig månadslön, avtalspension, ett brett försäkringsskydd och flera andra förmåner.**  

  

**Oavsett vad dina intressen är, är vi övertygade om att du kommer att hitta något att njuta av här!**  

  

**ANSÖKAN**  

**Låter detta som en roll för dig? Vi rekryterar löpande till denna roll, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. I rekryteringsprocessen arbetar vi agilt, vilket innebär att flera steg kan ske parallellt för att det ska bli en så smidig och värdefull kandidatupplevelse som möjligt för dig!**

**OM CAPGEMINI**  

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Digital Architect
description:
**OM ROLLEN**  

**Capgeminis Digitala Arkitekt-team i Skåne söker nya kollegor! Som Digital Arkitekt arbetar du med att designa och modernisera integrationer och större lösningar hos våra kunder. Med både bredd och djup erbjuder vi fantastiska möjligheter att förädla dina arkitekturfärdigheter, dela kunskap och utveckla dig tillsammans med skickliga kollegor i teamet. Du kan stationeras i Malmö eller Helsingborg efter vad du föredrar, båda kontoren centralt belägna med havsutsikt; över kajen i Malmö eller Öresund med blick mot Helsingör i Helsingborg.**  

  

**Vi har tre stora huvudområden för teamet:**  

* **Integrationer med och utan moln (hybrid och multi-cloud)**
* **Enterprise arkitektur**
* **Composability**

  

**DIN PROFIL**  

* **Du är en person som redan har gedigen erfarenhet inom minst två av de huvudområden som nämns ovan**
* **Du har hands-on erfarenhet inom Azure, AWS eller GCP och kan bevisa det med motsvarande certifiering**
* **Du är tekniskt begåvad och har med största sannolikhet någon gång arbetat som utvecklare**
* **Du har god kommunikations- och presentationsförmåga i kombination med förmåga att leda och vilja att ta ansvar för kundleveranser**
* **Du ska trivas med tanken på att modernisera äldre lösningar som nått olika långt på olika plan och har massvis med konstiga integrationsplattformar och legacy-teknik, men även att bygga upp nya lösningar från scratch**
* **Du skriver och talar flytande svenska**
  

**Meriterande om du även har:**  

* **Erfarenhet av att skapa arkitektur för större lösningar med många inblandade produkter och multi-cloud**
* **Erfarenhet av att designa eventbaserade lösningar**
  

**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**  

**Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med andra digitala arkitekter inom Capgemini. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i projekt med medelstora och stora internationella samt multinationella kunder. Du har friheten att utveckla dig själv med hjälp av Capgeminis egen utbildningsplattform som bl.a. ger dig tillgång till all molnrelaterad utbildning. Berätta om dina ambitioner och vi ser fram emot att hjälpa dig att nå dem: Get the future you want med oss på Capgemini!**  

  

**Förmåner:**  

* **Föräldraförmån**
* **Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy**
* **Tech communities**
* **Mentorskapsprogram (som mentor eller mentee)**
* **Delaktighet i Capgeminis olika fokusområden; Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club, Art club etc.**
* **Generöst friskvårdsbidrag & tjänstepension**
* **Bonusprogram**
* **Kompetensutveckling i form av utbildningar och certifieringar**
* **Roliga och inspirerande personalevent**
* **Företagshälsovård & sjukvårdsförsäkring**
  

**ANSÖKAN**  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår hemsida. Vi arbetar löpande i denna process och ser framemot din ansökan!**

**OM CAPGEMINI**  

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.**

title: Domänarkitekt
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens arkitektur? Vi söker en domänarkitekt till Transformation & IT på Fondliv som kan säkerställa rätt ekosystem och arkitektur för vår affär och den teknologiska roadmap. Bli en del av vår framåtlutade gruppering hos oss på Länsförsäkringar AB Fondliv söker vi en engagerad person som vågar testa nya idéer med tilltro till organisationens förmågor. Vi värdesätter ett roligt och stöttande arbetsklimat där framgångar delas och kunskap sprids.*  

*Med god insikt i organisationens behov och affärens dynamik, arbetar vi tillsammans för helheten och strävar alltid efter att prestera på topp. Vi ser också värdet i kompetensförflyttning och strävar efter att ständigt utveckla våra medarbetares färdigheter och kunskaper. Om du är nyfiken, nytänkande och vill bidra till vårt samhälle, då är du den vi söker! Bli en del av vårt team och hjälp oss forma framtiden och bidra till vår utveckling mot Ett Ledande Fondliv. Låter det intressant? Läs vidare!*  


**Om jobbet**
Vi söker en erfaren domänarkitekt som kommer att spela en viktig roll på Transformation & IT inom Livs arkitekturfunktion. Huvudsakliga syftet är att bidra till strategiska förflyttningar och säkerställa att IT-stödet utvecklas i enlighet med beslutade strategier och affärsmål. Du kommer vara del av Transformation och ITs ledningsgrupp och jobba tätt tillsammans med Livs BIO och övriga i ledningsgruppen.  


I rollen som domänarkitekt kommer du att:  


* Driva framtagandet av dokumentation och förankring av målbilder och färdplaner för Fondliv.
* Säkerställa framtidens IT-arkitektur för Fondliv och tvärfunktionellt på Länsförsäkringar AB.
* Samverka och kommunicera med aktuella målgrupper inom den egna grupperingen, avdelningen, enheten och andra affärsenheter.
* Utbyta erfarenheter med andra domänarkitekter.
* Ta fram och presentera lösningsbeskrivningar i arkitekturrådet och andra forum.
* Ansvara för framtagande av förvaltnings- och utvecklingsplaner inom domänen/leveransområdet.
* Vara sammanhållande för arkitekturgruppen på Fondliv och coacha lösningsarkitekter samt bidra i relaterade lösningsdiskussioner.

  


Du kommer att leda arbetet och jobba tillsammans med dina kollegor i arkitekturteamet, arbeta med övergripande arkitektur – livscykelhantering (modernisering och avveckling), digitalisering och automatisering av vårt systemlandskap. Du deltar och samverkar med arkitekter och forum inom övriga Länsförsäkringar för att representera Liv. Precis som övriga inom arkitekturteamet är du intresserad av och vill jobba kunddrivet enligt moderna metoder och agila arbetssätt.  


**Vem är du?**
För att lyckas i rollen som domänarkitekt har du som person ett starkt eget driv och flerårig relevant yrkeserfarenhet inom arkitekturområdet i ledande befattning. Du har erfarenhet av att nyttja arkitektur som styr- och förändringsinstrument och är metodisk med ett pragmatiskt förhållningssätt till arkitektens verktygslåda. Vi söker dig som har goda ledaregenskaper, integritet och vana att utmana existerande modeller.  


Kvalifikationer:  


* 10+ års relevant arbetserfarenhet.
* Erfarenhet av att leda grupper och individer.
* God förståelse för förändringsledning och hur man får med sig organisationen.
* Erfarenhet som domänarkitekt eller system- och lösningsarkitekt.
* Vana att arbeta med ramverk som SAFe, TOGAF och IASA.
* Förmåga att modellera arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med roadmaps och ta fram beslutsunderlag.
* Erfarenhet av digital transformation och molnförflyttningar.
* Akademisk utbildning med en teknisk inriktning eller arbetslivserfarenhet som bedöms likvärdig.
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

  


Teknisk kompetens:  


* God förståelse för hur man utvecklar en bra arkitektur för köpta tjänster och modern IT-utveckling.
* God förståelse för nödvändiga förmågor för IT-utveckling och kvalitetssäkring/testning.
* Cloud-teknologier (Azure, AWS, Kubernetes etc.).
* Hantering av testdata, IT-säkerhet och operations.

  


Meriterande kvalifikationer:  


* Branscherfarenhet inom liv och pension.
* Kunskap inom området för API och Microservices i en löst kopplad arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av arkitekturverktyg, gärna Sparx Enterprise Architect och LeanIX samt processutveckling inom IT.

  


Egenskaper och färdigheter:  


* God kommunikationsförmåga i tal och skrift.
* Kan vara en brygga mellan affär/verksamhet och teknik/IT.
* Engagerad och drivs av hög förändringstakt samt duktig förändringsledare.
* Förmåga att se helheten med intresse för detaljer.
* Vara samarbetsvillig, skicklig på kommunikation, engagerad och anpassningsbar till förändringstakt.
* Duktig presentatör och en god ”story teller”.

  


**Om oss**
Du kommer att tillhöra gruppen Arkitektur och projektledning inom avdelningen Transformation och IT på Fondliv. Vi planerar stora tekniska förflyttningar de närmsta åren, vilket innebär många spännande utmaningar och stora möjligheter att utvecklas. Hos oss får du en närvarande, engagerad och affärsorienterad chef samt ett värderingsstyrt förhållningssätt som grundar sig på dialog, tillit och respekt. Vi värdesätter samarbete, nytänkande och engagemang i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö. Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och leda vår resa mot en framtidssäker och affärsmässig arkitektur, då vill vi höra från dig!  


**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande?* *Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*  


**Sista ansökningsdag:** **2024-10-04**
  
Kort om tjänsten


**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidare
**Arbetsplats:** Stockholm
**Chef:** Fredrik Andlin
**Kontaktuppgifter:** fredrik.andlin@lansforsakringar.se
Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?


Bli en del av något större och börja jobba hos oss. En karriär hos Länsförsäkringar handlar lika mycket om att vara en hjälpande hand för våra kunder genom alla livets skeenden som att stärka lokalsamhället där du verkar.

title: Head of Cloud Services
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

 **About this opportunity:**

  

The Head of E2C Cloud Services role is responsible for resources and activities related to development, operations and delivery of the E2C infrastructure and platform services with in the R&D IT environment.

 **What you will do:**

  

* Leading a global organization to develop, operate and deliver E2C private cloud services implementing DevSecOps ways of working.
* Responsible to ensure teams execute and deliver on the E2C private cloud roadmap to our R&D stakeholders.
* Ensuring the E2C cloud services adhere to service SLA’s , meet security requirements and are highly available, scalable, performant and resilient.
* Build a high performing team of Managers and related subunits; championing a culture of accountability and empowering teams to excel.
* Responsible in meeting financial targets and related efficiency initiatives.
* Foster innovation, driving continuous improvements and implementing process enhancements.
* Leading collaboration internally and across the Ericsson R&D IT landscape in order to achieve strategic objectives and/or address our stakeholder requirements.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously improve the private cloud services offered and elevate team’s competence.

 **The skills you bring:**

  

* Bachelor’s degree or higher in Engineering or Computer Science.
* Comfortable to work in a fast-paced, high performing and continuously improving organization
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Team Player, able to contribute and support to various aspects of the organization.
* Self-motivated, capable of working proactively with limited supervision.
* People Development- Developing team competence ensuring continuous growth and learning.
* Adaptable- Willingness to take on tasks outside of a narrowly defined role, with a desire to grow in different areas.
* Capable of working in both tactical and strategic dimensions and timescales
* Extensive experience in designing, implementing, and managing private cloud solutions, preferably in an enterprise environment.
* Proven leadership experience, including Manager of managers.
* In-depth knowledge of virtualization, containerization, and cloud computing technologies (e.g., VMware, OpenStack, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, etc.).
* Strong understanding of networking, storage, and security principles as they relate to private cloud environments.
* Strong knowledge in DevSecOps principles and practice such as Continuous Integration/Deployment, automation, version control ,ITIL etc
* If you are energetic, hardworking and thrive in a collaborative and fast paced environment then please apply
 **Last date to apply : 23rd September 2024**

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

  

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Req ID:** 753674
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Experienced Cloud Foundation Technical Product Owner, Solna
description:
*Are you an experienced cloud engineer with a passion for cloud technologies? Do you thrive in a dynamic, hybrid work environment where innovation and collaboration are key? If so, we invite you to join our team and help us build, maintain, and scale our robust platform infrastructure.*

**Join us**
-----------


The Cloud Foundation Team is a platform engineering team, at PostNord, whose mission is to support all business division development teams with a modern runtime environment where they can develop and operate their own services. We work mainly with AWS and Azure including infrastructure as code, network, storage, compute, cloud security, scripting and automation, FinOps, DevEx, data migration as well as generic programming and infrastructure architecture design.

**Job duties:**
---------------


The cloud foundation technical product owner blends the technical understanding of PostNord cloud infrastructure with the internal product teams needs and aligns this with the Postnord cloud strategy.

* Overall responsible for the cloud landing zones in Azure and AWS.
* Manage cloud vendor relationship and utilize them to drive cloud maturity in the organization.
* Drive the fin-ops process together with Group IT finance team.
* Design, implement, and manage scalable and reliable cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure.
* Own product backlog that balances product team needs, product team onboarding with platform non-functional requirements.
* Product Ownership of the team and stakeholder management

**We are looking for you who have (need to have)**
--------------------------------------------------

* At least three years of previous experience with cloud in either an engineering or CCoE role.
* Proven experience with AWS and Azure cloud platforms.
* In depth understanding of the needs of software development teams when it comes to developer experience, deployment, and operations.
* Experience when dealing with vendors and utilizing their offerings such as training, workshops, and game-days.
* High level understanding of enterprise architecture patterns, microservices, network services, and firewalls.
* Good understanding of fin-ops practices.
* Proven experience working with cloud foundation like network, storage & compute in Azure.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills

### **Meritorious experience: (Nice-to-have)**

* Hands on experience developing in a cloud environment.
* Azure or AWS Certified.
* Extensive experience in Cloud service providers, for example AWS & Azure.
* Ability to enhance the DevEx (Developer Experience) for the organisation.

### **We Believe You Are a Person That Is**

* Thorough, analytical, and quick to learn
* Driven by new challenges
* Inclusive, structured, and responsible in your working style
* Able to handle stressful situations and prioritize tasks independently
* Feeling strong ownership for your delivery and your team
* Communicative and easy to collaborate with, building and nurturing long-term relationships

**We offer you:**
-----------------


We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation

**We make everyday life easier**
--------------------------------


PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com

**Apply**
---------


We look forward to receive your application!


If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Liber Rodriguez Florez on liber.rodriguez-florez@postnord.com


Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.


For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga


We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Salesforce Product Owner
description:
*Are you passionate about driving innovative CRM solutions? Epiroc is looking for an experienced Salesforce Product Owner to lead the continued transformation journey of the Salesforce platform. In this role, you will work closely with key stakeholders across sales, marketing, and customer service, ensuring that our Salesforce platform continues to meet the evolving needs of the business.*  


**Your mission**As the Salesforce Product Owner, you will play a critical role in providing Epiroc with a Salesforce platform that supports the needs of end-user teams across the company. You will take full ownership of the Salesforce platform journey, ensuring that the development and maintenance work aligns with the business roadmap, which in turn is co-created with stakeholders. In this role, you will work closely with teams in sales, marketing, customer service, and IT, identifying opportunities for process improvements and implementing the latest Salesforce features.  


Some key responsibilities include:
* Taking ownership of the Salesforce platform roadmap at Epiroc.
* Driving the creation of the business request backlog and aligning it with business needs.
* Facilitating communication with stakeholders across Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service to gather and document requirements.
* Leading the business prioritization of backlog items and collaborating with the development team.
* Managing the documentation process for business requests and the backlog.
* Working with the CRM Operations Manager, Salesforce Platform Architect, and the Salesforce Lead Developer to assess solutions and set priorities.
* Serving as a member of the Salesforce platform steering committee.

  


**Your profile**To succeed in this role, we believe that you must be passionate about change management and leading change. You thrive in a collaborative and dynamic environment, working closely with multiple stakeholders. You have strong communication skills and a passion for optimizing solutions. You have a keen understanding of Customer Relationship Management, as a concept, and understand the value that this brings to the organization. You must be comfortable working independently and as part of both virtual and local teams, and you have prior experience from similar transformation journeys earlier in your career.  

You bring the following skills and experience:
* 5-7 years of experience working with Salesforce Sales Cloud and/or Service Cloud, preferably in a multinational manufacturing company.
* Experience leading Salesforce transformations in an international setting.
* A proven track record of managing and optimizing the Salesforce platform.
* A deep understanding of Salesforce processes and best practices.
* Stakeholder and project management experience is a plus.
* A bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.
* Fluent in English, both written and verbal. Additional languages are a plus.

  


**Location and travel**
This position is located in Örebro, Sweden. Some domestic and international travel is involved in this role, approximately once a month.  


**Life at Epiroc**
By joining our team, you can expect an atmosphere of creativity, innovation, and workplace diversity. You will be a part of a group of skilled and helpful colleagues who live by our core values: Collaboration, Commitment, and Innovation. We work in a global environment with over 113 different nationalities!  


In addition to the fact that we have a culture that is characterized by development combined with having a good balance between work and leisure, there are some things that makes us a little extra proud to work at Epiroc:  


* Global career opportunities
* Epiroc University, for your own competence development
* Community involvement
* Benefits package, which amongst other things include flexible working hours and bonus.

  


**A hybrid workplace**Life at Epiroc can include the possibility for a hybrid workplace. It is a way of working that offers flexibility and participation allowing for a better balance between work and private life, which also promotes well-being. The hybrid workplace is an opportunity if work allows, based on your role, responsibilities, and individual conditions.  


**Application and contact information**
Welcome to submit your application as soon as possible by creating an account in our recruitment system. The last day to apply for this position is 2024-10-07.  

For questions about the position please contact recruiting manager or recruiter:
Fredrik Lindahl, Global Marketing Digitalisation and Portfolio Manager, fredrik.lindahl@epiroc.com
Ellinor Ekelof, Recruitment Specialist, ellinor.ekelof@epiroc.com  



**Epiroc** is a global productivity partner for mining and construction customers, and accelerates the transformation toward a sustainable society. With ground-breaking technology, Epiroc develops and provides innovative and safe equipment, such as drill rigs, rock excavation and construction equipment and tools for surface and underground applications. The company also offers world-class service and other aftermarket support as well as solutions for automation, digitalization and electrification. Epiroc is based in Stockholm, Sweden, had revenues of more than SEK 60 billion in 2023, and has around 18 200 passionate employees supporting and collaborating with customers in around 150 countries. Learn more at www.epirocgroup.com.

title: Data Centre General Operative (Part-Time)- Sweden
description:
Job Description: Data Centre Installer


ATC is a European logistics, white glove, and technical services specialist for data centres. Our focus is on anticipating the critical needs of our clients and delivering industry-leading standards for safety, security and reliability. Since being established in 1979, we have continued to lead our dedicated teams across Europe to build strong relationships with our clients.


Our mission is to deliver and install Europe’s data centres with precision and care. We achieve this by focusing on our team and our services:

* **Our Team** – Powered by people to keep data centres moving safely and securely.


We recognise that our greatest strength is our staff, which is why we promote a culture of personal development and professional training, both internally and from leading industry bodies.

* **Our Services** – We provide a range of specialised services tailored to the individual needs and demands of each client, their equipment, and their data centre infrastructure.


From managing specialised computer transport, and IT relocation services, to logistics and planning, and data centre commissioning and decommissioning; we adapt our 40+ years of expertise to every situation.


ATC operates in a dynamic global market where clients demand a service that is right first time, every time; we are recruiting motivated and driven people to work in a company that is *Driving Forward.*


This Role


ATC’s **Data Centre Installers** (DCIs) provide an essential service to our clients across Europe. They work inside our clients’ data centres delivering, positioning, and installing server racks to build their cloud infrastructure. Safety, security and customer service are the priorities for all ATC employees.


The DCI role provides candidates with opportunities to learn and develop. There are pathways to delivery supervisor, cabling technician, or team leader, and training and mentorship are provided. Candidates can also travel with work as part of ATC’s Mobilisation Team.

### **Responsibilities**

* Attend clients’ sites on time, with all required equipment, uniform, procedures and documentation, and PPE.
* Unloading, unpacking with power tools and positioning customers’ IT hardware (server racks).
* Lifting up to 30-40 kg is required, with occasional exertion up to 50kg (using safe lifting methods).
* Cabling server racks by patching and dressing fibre and copper cables (in certain regions, and training will be provided).
* Providing industry-leading customer service levels by acting professionally with clients and colleagues at all times.
* Following clients’ procedures and requirements, including health and safety, and security.
* Communicating with colleagues, including managers, planners, team leaders and supervisors, in a consistent, timely, and efficient manner. Reports include arrival times, delays, safety concerns, and completion times.
* Completing daily checklists and providing reports on daily activities or tasks, including other general administration tasks.
* Any other duties that may be assigned from time to time in line with your skills and competencies.

**Requirements**

### **Requirements**


The role requires flexibility and adaptability to changing situations and customer requirements, so the candidate must be comfortable working under pressure and on strict timelines. The candidate must be adaptable while performing tasks, ready to change priorities and maintain professional communications with clients, colleagues and vendors. The successful candidate will be required to possess and demonstrate the following:

* Strong organisational and problem-solving skills, with high levels of attention to detail.
* Valid class B driving licence with a good driving record.
* Basic experience with hand and power tools.
* Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel, Teams and Email.
* Language proficiency: B1 level in English and A2 level in the country of employment.

The following qualifications, skills and experience would be an advantage.

* Prior experience in a data centre, logistics or construction environment.
* Ability to be flexible and travel for work.
* Ability to complete checklists in Excel (or Teams) based on daily activities.
* Prior experience with the installation of structured cabling, including fibre and copper.

**Benefits**


The remunerating package, including salary and benefits, is negotiable depending on experience. The package may include the following:

* Competitive market salary.
* Performance-based bonus.
* Opportunities for continuing professional development will also be provided.
* Company pension plan (varies by region, subject to local employment laws).
* Sports & social club.

title: Senior Product Owner
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 5+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
  

**Rollbeskrivning:**  

Our client is currently expanding their capacity and capability within Test management tools. Therefore, we are now seeking a Senior Product Owner with several years of experience in a business environment.
  
  

In this pivotal role you will be responsible for defining, driving and prioritizing the product backlog and roadmap, ensuring that the test tool meets the user needs and aligns with our client’s business objectives.
  
  

You will work closely with their cross-functional teams, including three teams of developers in two different countries, Method developers, Coaches and end customers to deliver a high-quality test tool for the Embedded tool chain. The three teams operate in a toolchain environment where close cooperation with other development teams as well as customers will be a part of the daily work.
  
  

We need you to be an experienced leader who can keep calm in a complex environment and is used to multitasking. Since our client is a diverse company, you need to adapt your leadership to fit many different cultures and different people.
  
  

**Scenario:**  

**Current solution:** On prem solution for test management system built by our client used by primarily our clients users
  
  

**New solution:** Migrate IT-solutions to a cloud based solution accessible from any country where our client is present. Secure a strategic roadmap that fits our clients visions.
  
  

**Tasks:** Product owner responsibilities (in SAFe frame work). Some example of tasks would be manage and meet stakeholders for the Business Intelligence teams, prioritize the backlog, set a roadmap and estimate time for when tasks and deliverable would be complete. Very close cooperation with ScrumMaster, architect as well as team sponsor and line manager.
  
  

**Output:** excerpt of out e.g., Product roadmap, Strategic intake resulting in EPICs in our JIRA environment, Stakeholder map, business contact to both flow and line organization, be the point of contact to all our other teams, prioritized backlog, prioritized ongoing items.
  
  

Education
  
Master of Science, (other level of education is also acceptable if proven track record of work can match the education level), Scaled Agile Framework, SCRUM
  
  

Meriting
  
Running IT migrations and business intelligence organizations.
  
Experience from software tool development preferably related to test management tools.
  
Knowledge about Scanias electrical system and/or embedded systems in vehicles.
  
Experience from operating as product owner in a true global context
  
Experienced leader with at least 5 years leading large teams.
  
  

Language
  
Swedish & English on a professional level (Swedish can be excluded if necessary).
  
  

**Remote work:** Wednesdays are today mandatory to be on site. Requirement to be able to be on site 3 days a week minimum. At crucial situations there must be a possibility to work 5 days on site.
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Finance team (Malmö)
description:
Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.


We are looking for **senior SAP Finance professionals** who have an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in finance area providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.


**Qualifications**
------------------

Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:


* Thorough expertise in finance related SAP S/4HANA areas/competences such as Central Finance, FI/CO, Margin & Profitability Analysis, Project accounting with PS, Product Costing, Master Data modelling, Understanding of end to end process like Order to Cash, Procure to Pay or other
* Good understanding of SAP S/4HANA product roadmap (experience of other related SAP solutions such as e.g. Group Reporting, SAC is advantageous but not required) and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile) preferably with deployment experience e.g. global template rollouts
* Great addition (but not must) if the candidate has a high level understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW

Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:


* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills, and an ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as an advantage but is not required.
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
  

  

**How to apply**

Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* *https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/*  

  

**Questions?**

For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se .
  

  

**We are looking forward to your application!**  

  

For further information on Deloitte, please visit www.deloitte.se


**What impact will you make?**

Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.


**Job Location**
----------------
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Cloud Security Architect
description:
If IT Security is an If Group organization supporting If´s insurance business by maintain and develop cyber security actions within the entire If. If’s IT Security team provides security capabilities associated to the total infrastructure area. Our task is to review and assess the potential risk of new industry threats, as well as implement and manage technologies capable of detecting, investigating, and/or eliminating those threats.
  
We are looking for a new Cloud Security Architect for IT Security team to work in the Cloud Security area where main responsibility is in the Cloud security. Our team is working with the business and IT architects as well as driving our own security initiatives to plan, build, deploy security controls within If’s environment.
  
About the role
  
As a Cloud Security Architect, you will play a critical role in ensuring the security and integrity of cloud-based systems within our organization. Your expertise will be focused on Microsoft Azure, but you may also work with other cloud platforms such as Google Cloud.
  
  

**Main responsibilities:**  

Security Leadership and Architecture
  
* Act as a lead evangelist on security-related subjects related to Microsoft Azure, public cloud, container technologies, infrastructure transformation, networking, and data center operations.
* Create secure design recommendations for cloud applications, covering areas such as data protection, key management, authentication, and authorization.


Subject Matter Expertise
  
* Serve as the subject matter expert (SME) on cloud security for our organization.
* Develop standards, policies, and procedures best practices documentation.
* Participate in working groups to tailor the company’s security policies and standards for use in cloud environments.


Risk Assessment and Communication
  
* Translate security and technical requirements into business requirements.
* Communicate security risks to different audiences, ranging from business leaders to engineers.


Technical Solutions
  
* Design technical solutions, including creating prototypes and proofs of concept while maintaining a security mindset.
* Collaborate closely with application developers and system administrators to deliver creative solutions to complex technology challenges and business requirements.


Who are you?
  
You have a security-oriented mindset with strong knowledge of cloud security principles and practices, and you have excellent communication skills to address client information security concerns. You are familiar with Azure security architecture and Azure Security portal. You have an ability to create and implement secure design patterns.
  
  

**You also have:**  

* A relevant degree such as Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Business, Technical, Engineering, Information Systems, Design, Education, Information Security, or Information Technology is preferred.
* Relevant certifications such as CISSP, TOGAF and cloud technology-related ones from Microsoft and Google are valuable but not mandatory.


Additional facts and recruitment process
  
**Application deadline:** Last date to apply is 6th of October
  
**Location:** Turku, Espoo, Stockholm, Oslo or Copenhagen.
  
**To apply for the position:** Please attach your CV and answer the questions on the application form. Please notice that we are not able to handle any applications via email.
  
**Travelling:** Some travelling will be required since the role has responsibility throughout the countries in which If operates.
  
**Background check:** Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented.
  
For more information regarding the position, please contact Mika Rintamäki, Head of IT Security +358503291855, mika.rintamaki@if.fi.
  
We are eager to hear from you!

title: Line Manager PEU RAN Performance
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this Opportunity**


Are you a dynamic leader with a strong technical background, ready to spearhead the next generation of 5G wireless technology? Then this is for you. You are a people manager with the ability to understand your team and identify focus areas to create motivated and successful product development teams. You will be exposed to different stakeholders, why we see that you by nature have a business and customer focus.

  

As a leader in our organisation, you will guide development teams responsible for systemizing, designing, implementing, and testing software features for our cutting-edge Ericsson RAN Baseband. This role encompasses working with key future technologies in RAN network, such as Massive MIMO, beamforming, mmWawe as well as new cloud technology. Additionally, you'll break new ground by leveraging Machine Learning and AI to enhance our efficiency as well as our products.

  

In this role, you will report Head of the Product Engineering Group in Lund and be part of the unit's leadership team. If you thrive on innovation and are passionate about leading talented teams, this is your chance to make a significant impact.

 **Your Role and Responsibilities**  

* Mentor, challenge, and grow individuals and teams to their full potential.
* Support and drive innovative ideas and improvements, creating an environment encouraging creativity and continuous learning.
* Build and develop a culture of knowledge sharing and learning, ensuring a flow-optimized team environment.
* Work closely with colleagues across different regions, including Sweden, Ottawa, and Beijing, to drive technology and product leadership.
* Drive change management, formulate strategies, and act from a holistic view with the flexibility to tackle vital tasks.
 **Skills you bring**  

* University-level technical education is essential.
* A few years of experience as a team leader or manager in software development, with a proven ability to lead through effective and sustainable solutions.
* Experience in change management, with the ability to formulate strategies and concepts.
* A flexible approach to taking on vital tasks, with a good understanding of Lean and Agile methodologies.
* Experience in real-time embedded or DSP software development is a strong advantage.
* Experience in working with radio baseband or radio protocols is highly beneficial.
* Experience in cloud technology and cloud native deployments is beneficial.
* Experience in project management will set you apart.
 **What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


We encourage you to consider applying to jobs where you might not meet all the criteria. We recognize that we all have transferrable skills, and we can support you with the skills that you need to develop.

  

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer.

**Primary country and city:** [[Sweden]] || [[Lund]]

**Primary Recruiter:** [[Anitha Pulluru]]

**The last day of Job application is the 30th of September; we process applications as they come in.**

title: Cloud Manager at FLIR
description:
Join us as a Cloud Manager and lead our Cloud Team!
   

  

 We’re seeking a Digital Solutions Cloud Manager to drive our Cloud Team to new heights!
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone with a strong background in product management and cloud solutions who thrives on leading teams to develop and deliver innovative cloud-based applications. If you’re passionate about aligning cloud development with strategic goals and ensuring seamless execution from concept to delivery, this is the perfect opportunity for you!
   

  

**Top qualities we value in our new Cloud Manager:**
 ✅ Expertise in cloud architecture (AWS or Azure)
   

  

 ✅ Proven leadership and product management experience
   

  

 ✅ Ability to foster team collaboration and drive innovation
   

  

**About The Job**
 As the Digital Solutions Cloud Manager at Teledyne FLIR, you will take on a pivotal role in shaping the direction of our cloud products. Your primary responsibility will be to bridge the gap between business objectives and technical implementation, ensuring our cloud solutions meet both market needs and organizational goals. You will lead a talented team, prioritizing projects, managing timelines, and working closely with stakeholders to deliver exceptional cloud applications.
   

  

 What You’ll Do:
   

  

* Lead the Cloud Engineering Team: Mentor and manage a high-performing engineering team, ensuring they thrive in an agile environment. Provide leadership from development to deployment while fostering collaboration across the company.
* Define and implement cloud strategies: Partner with department leaders to shape the cloud vision, ensuring all technical solutions align with architectural and strategic business goals.
* Oversee the full development lifecycle: Manage the process and guide the team from requirements gathering to design, implementation, testing, and delivery of our cloud solutions.
* Drive agile processes: Help define and streamline Agile software development methodologies to maximize efficiency, collaboration, and success.


**About You**
 We are seeking a leader who excels in product management and has a clear understanding of how to drive cloud development projects from concept to delivery.
   

  

* Experienced in agile methodologies: You’re experienced in working within an Agile framework, adept at sprint planning, prioritization, and ensuring your team’s focus is aligned with product goals.
* Strong communication skills: You can clearly articulate product visions, manage expectations, and foster collaboration across multiple departments.
* Proven leadership skills: You have led engineering teams in an agile development process, guiding them from concept to production delivery. Experience as a product owner or manager is a plus.
* Technical Expertise: You have the technical skills necessary to guide your team in making sound engineering decisions, from development to deployment.
* Process-Oriented: You are experienced in leading processes from requirements through design, implementation, testing, and delivery.


 Why FLIR?
   

  

 At Teledyne FLIR, we are global leaders in thermal imaging and sensor technology, creating solutions that improve operational efficiency and safety across various industries. We are committed to nurturing innovation and supporting your growth. Join our dynamic work environment, where continuous learning and collaboration are key to success.
   

  

 Apply today and become an essential leader in developing cloud solutions that drive safety and sustainability technology.

title: Head of Cloud Services
description:
Grow with us
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 The Head of E2C Cloud Services role is responsible for resources and activities related to development, operations and delivery of the E2C infrastructure and platform services with in the R&D IT environment.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Leading a global organization to develop, operate and deliver E2C private cloud services implementing DevSecOps ways of working.
* Responsible to ensure teams execute and deliver on the E2C private cloud roadmap to our R&D stakeholders.
* Ensuring the E2C cloud services adhere to service SLA’s , meet security requirements and are highly available, scalable, performant and resilient.
* Build a high performing team of Managers and related subunits; championing a culture of accountability and empowering teams to excel.
* Responsible in meeting financial targets and related efficiency initiatives.
* Foster innovation, driving continuous improvements and implementing process enhancements.
* Leading collaboration internally and across the Ericsson R&D IT landscape in order to achieve strategic objectives and/or address our stakeholder requirements.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously improve the private cloud services offered and elevate team’s competence.


**The skills you bring:**
* Bachelor’s degree or higher in Engineering or Computer Science.
* Comfortable to work in a fast-paced, high performing and continuously improving organization
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Team Player, able to contribute and support to various aspects of the organization.
* Self-motivated, capable of working proactively with limited supervision.
* People Development- Developing team competence ensuring continuous growth and learning.
* Adaptable- Willingness to take on tasks outside of a narrowly defined role, with a desire to grow in different areas.
* Capable of working in both tactical and strategic dimensions and timescales
* Extensive experience in designing, implementing, and managing private cloud solutions, preferably in an enterprise environment.
* Proven leadership experience, including Manager of managers.
* In-depth knowledge of virtualization, containerization, and cloud computing technologies (e.g., VMware, OpenStack, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, etc.).
* Strong understanding of networking, storage, and security principles as they relate to private cloud environments.
* Strong knowledge in DevSecOps principles and practice such as Continuous Integration/Deployment, automation, version control ,ITIL etc

 You will work closely with their cross-functional teams, including three teams of developers in two different countries, Method developers, Coaches and end customers to deliver a high-quality test tool for the Embedded tool chain. The three teams operate in a toolchain environment where close cooperation with other development teams as well as customers will be a part of the daily work.
   

  

 We need you to be an experienced leader who can keep calm in a complex environment and is used to multitasking. Since our client is a diverse company, you need to adapt your leadership to fit many different cultures and different people.
   

  

**Scenario:**
 Current solution: On prem solution for test management system built by our client used by primarily our clients users
   

  

 New solution: Migrate IT-solutions to a cloud based solution accessible from any country where our client is present. Secure a strategic roadmap that fits our clients visions.
   

  

**Tasks:** 
 Product owner responsibilities (in SAFe frame work). Some example of tasks would be manage and meet stakeholders for the Business Intelligence teams, prioritize the backlog, set a roadmap and estimate time for when tasks and deliverable would be complete. Very close cooperation with ScrumMaster, architect as well as team sponsor and line manager.
   

  

**Output:** 
 excerpt of out e.g., Product roadmap, Strategic intake resulting in EPICs in our JIRA environment, Stakeholder map, business contact to both flow and line organization, be the point of contact to all our other teams, prioritized backlog, prioritized ongoing items.
   

  

**Education**
 Master of Science, (other level of education is also acceptable if proven track record of work can match the education level), Scaled Agile Framework, SCRUM
   

  

**Meriting**
* Running IT migrations and business intelligence organizations
* Experience from software tool development preferably related to test management tools
* Knowledge about Scania´s electrical system and/or embedded systems in vehicles.
* Experience from operating as product owner in a true global context
* Experienced leader with at least 5 years leading large teams


**Language**
 Swedish & English on a professional leve
   

  

**Requirements**
 Required skills
   

  

 Embedded Systems
   

  

 SAFe framework
   

  

 Automotive Industry
   

  

 Jira
   

  

 Cross functional teams
   

  

 Languages
   

  

 English
