**Your Role**
 We Are Entering An Exciting Phase Where We Want To Integrate AI, Gamification, And Social Learning To Take HP-appen To New Heights. As Our New CTO, You Will
   

  

* Strategically plan the development of new features, set priorities, and establish structures.
* Lead and inspire our development team of four to maximize efficiency and creativity.
* Make critical technical decisions in collaboration with the team and the founders.
* Actively contribute to coding the future of HP-appen.


 This fall, we will strengthen and make our codebase more robust, and you will step in right away to shape this process.
   

  

**Who You Are**
* Experienced full-stack developer with strong expertise in React, Node.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
* Comfortable with taking on significant responsibility and working strategically with both teams and management.
* Experience with AI implementation and using AI tools to streamline development processes.
* Motivated to take a company from its early stages to maturity and to be a key player in that journey.


**Compensation**
 This is a
 **full-time position** 
 with
 **no fixed salary** 
 . Instead, we offer a
 **significant ownership share** 
 of the company. We are seeking someone who is willing to invest their time and skills to build something big and successful with us.
   

  

 Why HP-appen?
   

  

* Global Team: We have no physical offices; all communication is online. You will collaborate with colleagues in Stockholm as well as in Argentina and Pakistan.
* Impact: Your contributions will be a crucial part of HP-appen's future and success.
* Entrepreneurial Opportunity: With a large ownership stake, you will be a central part of the company's growth and success.


**For more information or questions please contact us at** 
 magnus@hpappen.se or phone number 0704326924

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Supply Chain team (Stockholm)
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**




 Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.
   





 We are growing in the supply chain area and are looking for a SAP Supply Chain professional and/or SAP Procurement professional who has an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in the supply chain area (e.g S2P, SD, WM, IBP, GTS) providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.
   

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:
   




* Experience of SAP consulting / SAP SME / Stream lead / Project Manager roles in transformation projects, being the expert of one or several SAP process areas such as MM, SD, WM, IBP, GTS.
* A good understanding of end-to-end business processes, SAP best practices, and latest industry trends.
* A good understanding of the SAP product roadmap and experience of SAP S/4HANA and other SAP technologies.
* A deep understanding of various phases of project lifecycle (prepare, explore, realize, deploy) and a good understanding of S/4HANA product roadmap and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile)
* Have a team player attitude and hunger to develop new professional skills.
* Understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW



 Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:
   




* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with 5-10 years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Also, a background with at least some experience in leading and/or coordinating your own stream.
* Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders.
* Ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner.
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as advantage but not required.


**Additional Information**

**We offer**




 At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
   

  

 Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
   

  

**How to apply**




 Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
   

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* 
*https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/* 
  

  

**Questions?**




 For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se.
   

  

**We are looking forward to your application!** 
  

  

 For further information on Deloitte, please visit
 
 www.deloitte.se
   






**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Then our roles as SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant in our SAP Business Group are a perfect find for you! Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career. You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
 **About Our Nordic SAP Business Group** 
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic and Global SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP S/4 HANA driven business transformation programs with several of the biggest companies. Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, Ariba, Icertis, SAP BTP and SAP RISE. Our proven delivery methods inclde preconfigured industry template and embrace new capabilities introduced by AI . We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at experienced candidates for several positions and seniority levels. To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
 **What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects.

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career.

- Rich opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert network and benchmarks.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Utilize your functional and technical expertise in SAP, by analyzing, designing, and implementing business processes supported by SAP best practice solutions.

- Utilize your Industry expertise in the field of SAP solutions to deliver client value as a professional individual and as part of a team.

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through SAP transformations.

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower and contribute to thought leadership, competence development, and sales initiatives. SAP Smart Procurement Nordic Value Tower The sourcing & procurement function is shifting. Traditionally driven and managed by deep and complex processes, their future must become digital, data driven and automated. Helping our clients to succeed in this transformation journey is what we thrive for. SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower is one out of 10 different process specialization communities within our Nordic SAP Business Group. We work hand in hand with our procurement strategy colleagues and our global delivery centers. Our cross-Nordics team designs and configure sourcing & procurement processes in S/4 HANA, Ariba upstream and downstream processes and Fieldglass - and we excel both in large, global S/4 HANA engagements (from smart brownfield through full business transformations) as well as in more focused multi-step process capability deployments.

**Required Qualifications**
- Min. 3 years of hands-on SAP S/4 HANA sourcing & procurement experience as consultant from at least two S/4HANA projects (preferably in the Nordics)

- Based in Nordics or EU, with either EU citizenship or valid work permit

- Good understanding of sourcing and procurement business processes and their key value drivers

- Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment

- Motivated, persistent, eager to optimize, drive for excellence

- Passionate about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source, and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

- We recruit at different levels. For manager level and above, we would like you to have:

- at least 7 years of relevant project experience as well as

- having led a team

- demonstrating leadership skills, and ideally also

- some earlier involvement in the acquisition of new projects (business development).

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience of the full S/4 project lifecycle including estimating, planning, and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

- An SAP certification in relevant area

- Ariba experience in addition to S/4 HANA configuration

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

**Location** 
 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö
   

  

**Does this appeal to you?**
 If so, we really wish to hear from you! (We need people who can challenge conventional wisdom, offer unique perspectives, and contribute with innovative solutions.)
   

  

*If you are interested to learn more about Accenture´s recruitment process, great! We have gathered more info for you* 
*here.*
 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: Asset Planner - Hydrologist
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Are you interested in hydrology and curious to understand what role hydrology plays in the energy market? At Vattenfall, we don’t just “do energy”, we exist to help our customers power their lives in ever climate smarter ways and enable fossil freedom. If you are looking for exciting challenges and the opportunity to be part of this change, then join our diverse and talented team and make a difference!
   

  

**The department, team, and job:**
 This position will connect the operational (Planning and Optimisation Nordic) and analytical (Fundamental Analysis) teams. Planning and Optimisation Nordic is a team responsible for maximising Vattenfall’s Nordic hydro-, nuclear- and heat production on the Nordic power and ancillary service markets. As part of the Analysis department, the Fundamental Analysis team delivers models and analyses on power markets, deals and assets. We provide model-based forecasts of power prices and analysis of price drivers to support decision making in the traded market horizon and beyond. Long- and short-term inflow forecasting are key drivers in all these processes.
   

  

 The position is located in Arenastaden, Solna (Stockholm) as part of an international team of highly professional, skilled analysts, located in Hamburg and Stockholm.
   

  

**What you will mainly do:**
 The focus of this role will be all aspects of Nordic hydrology and its representation in our fundamental models as well in operational production planning processes. You will get the opportunity to engage in
   

  

* Coordination and driving our hydro model development for forecasting and operational production planning.
* Development of our hydrological models and integration with our fundamental models.
* Improving our inflow forecast by, for example including internal metrological forecast.
* Developing new model features according to stakeholder requirements (e.g. improved snow modelling).
* Improving model architecture to make more efficient use of the cloud infrastructure and optimize code and data integration.
* Enabling profitable trading strategies through providing hydrological and price forecasting analyses.


 If you are not already familiar with the Nordic power market you will get the unique opportunity to learn it from the inside. You will not only serve the organisation with hydrological expertise but also have external contacts towards organisations such as SMHI, Water Regulation Enterprises and Energiforsk.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

* Strong interest and experience in Nordic Hydrology and power markets acquired by work experience or education
* A relevant University degree, for example in Engineering, Hydrology, Mathematics or similar
* A high computer literacy, in particular programming skills in Python.
* An understanding of how to facilitate cooperation with different stakeholders
* Fluency in English and Swedish (these are both strictly required).
* Willingness to travel occasionally.


 Mer information
   

  

**Our Offer**
* A welcoming work climate with flat hierarchies, appreciation for own initiative and an open discussion culture.
* An international and multi-cultural work environment with energetic colleagues.
* A dynamic and challenging working environment where constantly changing markets translate to evolving customer requirements.
* Being part of the Analysis community, where we eagerly share knowledge and ideas regarding a wide range analytical topics relevant to the electricity market.
* A flexible and supportive work culture, in an Agile/Scrum setting without micro-management, where you as a team are trusted to be the specialists on how to do your work.
* Opportunities and support for professional growth. For example, the encouragement to do internal rotations to broaden your horizon.
* Flexible working hours, including working remotely up to half of the time per week.


 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Read more about this and other benefits here: Start your climate smarter career - Vattenfall
   

  

**Location** 
 , Solna
   

  

**For more information** 
 about the position you are welcome to contact the hiring managers Per Larsson, +46705595797 or Richard Hebly, +491622323626. For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact Recruiter, Peter Blixter, +46722373202
   

  

 Trade union representatives in Sweden: Anders Bohlin (Unionen), Sven-Gunnar Gremlin (Akademikerna). To get in contact with the representatives, please call Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.
   

  

 We welcome your application, including CV and cover letter via the link,
 **no later than October 6, 2024** 
 . As we may conduct interviews on an ongoing basis, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. We will not be able to handle applications via e-mail.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Since Vattenfall is part of the Swedish critical infrastructure many of our positions are security classed. This position is security classed hence the final candidates will be subject to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21 000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years.

title: Radionätplanerare till Vinnergi
description:
*Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vill vara med och forma framtidens kommunikationsnät? Hos Vinnergi affärsområde Communicate söker vi engagerade radionätplanerare som vill bidra till Sveriges säkerhet och arbeta med avancerade kommunikationslösningar.* 




*Som radionätplanerare hos oss kommer du att arbeta med både teknisk planering och strategisk nätutveckling. Vinnergi erbjuder flexibilitet med 25 kontor att välja mellan, vilket gör att du kan anpassa din arbetsplats efter dina preferenser.* 
 Vill du vara med och utveckla framtiden tillsammans med oss? Läs mer om oss på vår Karriärsida.
 



  





**Din roll som Radionätplanerare** 




 Som radionätplanerare på Vinnergi Communicate jobbar du både på vårt kontor och ute hos kund med civila kommunikationslösningar. Rollen är mycket omväxlande och omfattar allt från framtagande av tekniska specifikationer till verifiering av leveranser och kräver därför en stor portion av personligt ansvar. Arbetet innebär strategisk nätplanering och design för radionät, inklusive transmissions- och växelnät samt optimering av nät, cellplanering och utredningar.
 



 I rollen kommer du även ansvara för projektering av anläggningsdokumentation, kostnadsuppföljning, anbudsunderlag och materialbeställningar samt att ditt arbete bedrivs inom ramen för aktuella kvalitets- och miljöanvisningar. Du kommer genomföra mätningar med specialinstrument för radiokommunikation och ha kontinuerlig kontakt med entreprenörer och externa kunder i arbetet. Resor kan förekomma i tjänsten.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi letar efter dig som är positiv, flexibel och ansvarsfull med en stark känsla för kvalitet. Du trivs både med att arbeta självständigt och i grupp och tar egna initiativ för att säkerställa framgångsrika resultat. För oss är det självklart att du aktivt medverkar i utvecklingen av såväl affärer som verksamhet.
 



 Det är också viktigt att du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Vi ser gärna att du uppskattar arbete i mindre uppdrag i nära samarbete med våra kunder och underleverantörer.
 



 Vi tror du har några års erfarenhet av arbete inom exempelvis radionätplanering, samexistensproblematik eller civila radiosystem såsom TETRA/RAKEL eller mobila inomhusnät. Det är meriterande om du har informationssäkerhetskompetens eller kunskap inom Cyber Security kopplat till tele- och datakommunikation.
 



  





*Vi tycker det är viktigt att du är en kulturbärare för Vinnergi och känner igen dig själv i våra värderingar H.E.R.O.* 




  





 Då rollen berör samhällsviktig verksamhet och säkerhetsklassad information, så kan det krävas att du godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning innan anställning kan genomföras. Vid frågor gällande bakgrundskontroll och säkerhetsprövning, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare.
 



 Urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Låter rollen intressant, så tveka inte att ansöka redan idag. Välkommen!
 



  





**Om Vinnergi** 




 Vi hjälper våra kunder att utveckla sina verksamheter inom telekom, energi, fastighet och industri. Enkelt uttryckt så gör vi vardagen inkopplad, påkopplad och uppkopplad. På Communicate blir du en del av ett växande och kompetent team konsulter inom kommunikationsinfrastruktur – som har kul på jobbet, hjälper varandra och utbyter erfarenheter. Läs mer om oss på Communicate och lär känna oss som jobbar här eller spana in vår Linkedin eller vår podd Work At Vinnergi
 



 Vår värdegrund stavas H.E.R.O. – Happy, Explore, Ready och Open och är grunden i vår företagskultur. Förutom starkt fokus på värderingar, en platt organisation med hög påverkansgrad så är dessutom många av våra medarbetare delägare. Det gör oss till ett tryggt och nyskapande företag med engagerade medarbetare som utvecklas både i sin yrkesroll och som människor.
 



 Vi är övertygade om att teknisk innovation är lösningen för att bygga en hållbar framtid för kommande generationer. På Vinnergi arbetar vi i framtiden varje dag. Bli en av oss!

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has an always-on mindset with a strong background in designing, configuring, and managing solutions for devices, tools, and applications in a factory/corporate setting.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Understand and reflect on the customer needs to bring value to the organization.
* Take part in the development cycle using innovative technologies and frameworks.
* Secure qualitative, efficient and performance deliveries.
* Provide input for the design and construction of test cases and scenarios and help validate executed test results.
* Contribute to boosting the team to continually increase knowledge, competence, performance, and innovation
* Collaborate with suppliers, architects, engineers, developers, and internal stakeholders on upcoming and innovative technologies and standardization.
* Collaborate with the local IT site teams for problem/opportunity analysis.


**Qualifications**
* Hold a bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or equivalent experience in a relevant field.
* Knowledge and experience in agile development practices, ITIL (incident, problem & change process), collaboration tools (such as Azure DevOps or similar)
* Java development & support, relational databases (Oracle, SQL server, My SQL).
* Eager to learn and grow (yourself and the company) using a modern approach to Software Engineering.
* Ability to work under rapidly changing conditions and have the capability to identify, mitigate and decide on solutions when facing obstacles.
* You are fluent in English, both verbally and written.
* You should have a general understanding of production processes and understand how all these things work together to make end user applications work well.
* Knowledge of the automotive industry is meritorious.


**Experience**
* Knowledge about databases (MS SQL (Azure))
* Development platforms (Java, OpenShift, ...)
* Azure Cloud (App services, AKS Azure Kubernetes Cluster)
* SQL server for database
* Azure Storage, Azure Container Services
* Frameworks (Spring, Springboot, WebFlux, ...)
* Messaging (MQ, Kafka, REST API, ...)
* Front-end (Angular)
* Test Driven Development (Unit testing in Spring Boot and Angular, in memory database testing using Mockito)
* Agile processes (Safe / Scrum / ADO) but also about backlog management, strategic planning, business relationship management, problem analysis and business modelling.
* Bonus points for having relevant experience using docker containers and orchestration with Kubernetes.


**Benefits**
**Who are we?**
 Expleo is a rapidly growing consulting company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions in the fields of AI engineering, digitalization, hyper-automation, cybersecurity, and data science. With a strong commitment to integrity, diversity, sustainability, and societal security, Expleo is at the forefront of creating a better future. Join our dynamic team and be part of our journey to shape the future of technology and business.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
* Collaborative working environment – we stand shoulder to shoulder with our clients and our peers through good times and challenges
* We empower all passionate technology loving professionals by allowing them to expand their skills and take part in inspiring projects
* Expleo Academy - enables you to acquire and develop the right skills by delivering a suite of accredited training courses
* Always working as one team, our people are not afraid to think big and challenge the status quo
* Collective agreement with the union
* Access to a collection of benefits and discounted prices on services and shops.
* Health benefits
* Expleo team activities


 "We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age ”.

title: Senior Product Manager, Angry Birds 2
description:
Rovio is part of the SEGA family and world famous for our flagship IP Angry Birds - want to know more about Rovio as an employer? Click here.
   

  

 Our Stockholm studio has built one of the largest comebacks in the gaming industry - Angry Birds 2! We take pride in our culture that helped make this game a success, where anything can be changed and everything is tested.
   

  

 We are now looking for a
 **Senior Product Manager** 
 to join the Angry Birds 2 team in our vibrant studio in the centre of Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 If you love building and improving F2P games based on deep player understanding, are passionate about data driven development, get excited about designing performant features, and would like to work and collaborate with uncommonly dedicated professionals - apply now!
   

  

 Not in Sweden? We provide relocation support.
   

  

 If you are already in Barcelona, you can also be located in our new studio here.
   

  

 You will have impact and fun at work by:
   

  

* Planning, prioritising, and running feature development efforts for an area of the game all while ensuring an outstanding player experience
* Driving improvements to business performance for both new and existing features based on your knowledge of engagement & monetization mechanics, player behaviour, and F2P game design
* Analysing the game metrics and proactively identifying and implementing optimizations to improve the player experience and core financial performance keeping in mind the needs of a mature F2P game
* Supporting the Game Lead by providing input on the strategic direction for Angry Birds 2 overall
* Being responsible for the A/B testing process helping to validate hypotheses and translating the results into actions that help steer our games into the right direction
* Constantly bringing an outside-in view and deep market expertise by benchmarking competitors and identifying new & promising practices from the leading games in the market


 Experience and skills we are looking for:
   

  

* Experience working as a Product Manager with live F2P mobile titles
* Deep understanding of F2P live-ops, economy, and game design and eagerness to learn about Angry Birds players
* Track record of crafting F2P features that drive increases to retention, engagement, and monetization
* Experience in tuning and balancing live-ops features to drive sustainable long-term performance
* Experience with defining strategy and the ability to translate overall strategy into a roadmap that creates product growth
* Strong analytical capabilities paired with the drive to analyse game data with the assistance of game analysts


 Please send your CV in English. We look forward to talking to you.
   

  

 We welcome applicants to use the name they want to be addressed by in the application form, regardless of whether it is their legal name.
   

  

 At Rovio, we are also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities or special needs in our working environment and job application procedures. We are committed to continuously improving workplace accessibility. If you have any questions before applying, please write to us at recruitment@rovio.com.

**Hiring process at Rovio**
**About Rovio**

title: Teknikkonsulter inom Försvar och Telekom till Vinnergi
description:
*Bli en del av något större – kombinera styrkan från Försvarsmakten med innovationskraften hos Vinnergi. Som konsult inom Försvar/Telekom på Vinnergi är du en del av en revolution inom kommunikationsinfrastruktur och formar en säkrare och mer uppkopplad värld med oss!* 
*Bli en framtidsintegratör tillsammans med oss, sök tjänsten redan idag!* 




  





**Din roll som konsult inom Försvar & Telekom** 




 Som konsult på Vinnergi kommer du att ha en avgörande roll i att utveckla och förstärka våra kunders verksamheter inom telekom, energi, fastighet och industri. Du kommer att vara en del av ett dynamiskt och kompetent team som brinner för att skapa innovativa lösningar och göra världen mer uppkopplad än någonsin tidigare
 



 .Du kommer att få möjlighet att arbeta med en rad spännande projekt, beroende av din tidigare erfarenhet, inom områden som projektledning, projektering, nätverksadministration och infrastrukturutveckling. Din erfarenhet från Försvarsmakten kommer att vara en ovärderlig tillgång när du hjälper oss att forma och förbättra kommunikationsplattformar och telenät för framtiden
 



  





**.** 




**Varför Vinnergi?** 



* Möjlighet att göra verklig skillnad för det civila försvaret och Sveriges säkerhet
* Utvecklingsmöjligheter för rätt person, med stöd och resurser för att ta din karriär till nästa nivå
* Spännande möjlighet till internationella uppdrag och samarbeten.



  





 Vi är redan stolta över vår kompetens inom den civila sektorn, men vi är övertygade om att inkluderingen av försvarskunniga kommer att ta oss till nya höjder. För rätt person finns spännande möjligheter till personlig och professionell utvecklin

title: Solution Architect
description:
**About Applied Intuition**
---------------------------



Applied Intuition is a Tier 1 vehicle software supplier that accelerates the adoption of safe and intelligent machines worldwide. Founded in 2017, Applied Intuition delivers the AI-powered ADAS/AD toolchain, vehicle platform, and an autonomy stack to help customers shorten time to market, build high-quality systems, and create next-generation consumer experiences. 18 of the top 20 global automakers trust Applied Intuition's solutions to drive the production of modern vehicles. Applied Intuition serves the automotive, trucking, construction, mining, agriculture, and defense industries and is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in Ann Arbor and Detroit, MI, Washington, D.C., Stuttgart, Munich, Stockholm, Seoul, and Tokyo. Learn more at appliedintuition.com.



Please note that we are an in-office company, which means the expectation is that you would come in to your Applied Intuition office 5 days a week.

**Meet our Solution Architects!**
---------------------------------


Our Solution Architects (SA) act as the glue between our customers and our engineering teams. They are responsible for customer success and drive impact with high-priority customer engagements – hear from them on what life is like at Applied Intuition and what makes their roles so exciting!

**About the role**
------------------


(We are hiring for all levels of experience.)

We are looking for bright software engineers interested in extending and adapting our products for Applied Intuition's global customers. Our Solution Architects have a unique mix of software expertise, domain knowledge, and an execution-driven mindset. Using these skills, our engineers work closely with autonomy developers to ensure that Applied Intuition's products are providing maximum impact to advance customers autonomy initiatives. This is an important role for the company, bringing together our product and engineering expertise with our customer-centric culture.

Check out what a typical day would look like as a Solution Architect here!
**At Applied Intuition, you will:**
-----------------------------------


* Work closely with customers to understand their development needs and use cases for autonomy to propose effective use of Applied Intuition's products
* Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure the product roadmap enables current and prospective customers
* Ensure customer needs are supported by the broader engineering team through effective prioritization
* Collaborate with our sales team to gather requirements through detailed technical discussions and workshops
* Explore new product development areas driven by strategic understanding of the customer landscape

**We're looking for someone who has:**
--------------------------------------


* Experience with interacting with end-customers as an application engineer or a developer
* Familiarity with best practices in large scale software development
* Strong communication skills and focus on solving customer problems

**Nice to have:**
-----------------


* Prior background in technical sales or application engineering for simulation products
* Experience with automotive OEMs or suppliers
* Prior work in autonomous vehicle development domains
* Prior work in software simulation

*Don't meet every single requirement? If you're excited about this role but your past experience doesn't align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.*


*Applicants will be required to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 upon commencing employment. Reasonable accommodations will be considered on a case-by-case basis for exemptions to this requirement in accordance with applicable federal and state law. Applicants should be aware that for external-facing roles that involve close contact with Company employees or other third parties on the Company's premises, accommodations that involve remaining unvaccinated against COVID-19 may not be deemed reasonable. The Company will engage in the interactive process on an individualized basis taking into account the particular position.*


*Applied Intuition is an equal opportunity employer and federal contractor or subcontractor. Consequently, the parties agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60-1.4(a), 41 CFR 60-300.5(a) and 41 CFR 60-741.5(a) and that these laws are incorporated herein by reference. These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. These regulations require that covered prime contractors and subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status or disability. The parties also agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of Executive Order 13496 (29 CFR Part 471, Appendix A to Subpart A), relating to the notice of employee rights under federal labor laws.*

title: Senior Thermal Hardware Engineer
description:
Etteplan is a leading actor in the engineering consulting industry, constantly striving to shape future innovations. We are seeking passionate and skilled individuals who want to be part of our dynamic team and contribute to solving complex technical challenges. With us, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and with cutting edge clients, collaborate with experts in various technical fields, and develop innovative solutions that will impact society. Join our successful team where your ideas become reality, and your work makes a real difference!


In Sweden we are more than 700 engineers with a common interest for technology and people, and more than 4000 engineers globally. We are experts in mechanical design, software and embedded systems and advanced technical documentation. Currently represented by more than 80 offices in Sweden, Finland, Denmark, the Netherlands, Germany, Poland and China, we can offer a truly global business possibility. We have many opportunities for anybody who strive to learn something new and enjoys developing together with their colleagues.


### **Your work responsibilities**


We are looking for a seasoned Senior Thermal Hardware Engineer with extensive experience in leading design projects from conception to completion. In this role, you will have the opportunity to leverage your expertise to mentor junior engineers, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and contribute to the development of groundbreaking products and solutions.


We are specialized in the area known in the industry as “thermal management”, meaning heating and cooling applications in general but specifically within vehicles and heat pumps. If you have a background in mechanical design, thermodynamics and energy systems this is definitely the place to be.


Your work days will consist of leading the design and development of complex mechanical components and systems, ensuring adherence to project timelines and quality standards. You will utilize advanced CAD software (e.g., CATIA V5, Creo) to create detailed 3D models, assemblies, and technical drawings. Besides this, conducting analysis and simulations to optimize designs for performance, reliability, and manufacturability will be a part of your usual assignments. You will have the responsibility to provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering their professional growth and development. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams including R&D, manufacturing, and quality assurance to ensure seamless project execution will also be part of your usual duties. Also, staying alert of emerging technologies and industry trends to identify opportunities for innovation and improvement will be part of your routine.


### **Your profile**


* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical or Energy Engineering or related field.
* 5 years or more of progressive experience in thermal hardware design, preferably within automotive industry.
* Proven track record of successfully leading design projects from concept to production.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
* Demonstrated leadership abilities and a passion for mentoring and developing talent.

### **Our offer**


With us, you get a job that has meaning. At Etteplan, we are fortunate to be able to work on interesting and important projects that contribute to the benefit of society. Many people benefit from and enjoy the development projects we are involved in - and that is something we know our employees are proud of.


We offer you an interesting and international work environment, as well as support from both colleagues and the company as a whole. We support work-life balance, not only through really good benefits, but also by offering the possibility of hybrid work. For your well-being, we offer all employees a maximum wellness allowance. Apply today and make a difference with us!

  


If you have any questions, please contact the recruiting manager Pontus Lith.


Read more about what it's like to work at Etteplan and meet your future colleagues here.


  
**Sista ansökningsdag**
2024-10-06  


**Placeringsort**
Göteborg  


**Hemsida**
etteplan.com/careers  


**Kontakta**
Pontus Lith
Team manager  



  

  

**Följ oss**

title: HW Design Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 5+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
  

**Rollbeskrivning:****Purpose of Position:**  

Strengthen a medical device development project, as well as owning the electronics of a product on the market. Act as Hardware Engineer according to the Mölnlycke QMS and be an integral part of a tight team responsible for the hardware and embedded system of the products.
  
Cooperate with other electronics engineers, system engineers, software developers and testers to ensure a stable, safe and efficient product.
  
  

**Key Accountabilities:**  

Own the electronic components in a new medical device development project.
  
Identify and evaluate alternative design solutions, including component selection, prototyping and testing.
  
Develop and own the technical documentation for the electronics in a medical device such as:
  
  

* Requirement specifications
* Design Failure Mode and Effect Analysis (DFMEA)
* Component specifications


Plan and coordinate activities related to HW development.
  
Conduct reviews of electrical schematics and PCB designs.
  
Lead efforts for compliance testing against medical standards, EMC, ESD and Radio.
  
Develop test methods and perform analysis such as single-fault condition testing according to medical standards.
  
Specify and develop production test.
  
Own and maintain the electronic components and documentation of a medical device on the market.
  
  

**Qualifications and Experience:**  

More than 5 years of experience in embedded systems electronics
  
Experience from medical device industry
  
Proven knowledge in IEC 60601
  
Hands on experience of technical documentation for medical electronic equipment
  
Experience from certification of medical electronic equipment
  
Proven track record of electronics design including analogue and digital circuits
  
Knowledge of design for manufacturability, production test and preferably experience of working with contract manufacturing
  
Experience of battery-operated devices
  
Academic background in engineering (bachelor’s or master’s degree) preferably within the field of electronics
  
Fluent in English, and preferably also Swedish
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Konsultchef Mekatronik
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Söker du en arbetsplats där du dagligen får utmanas och utvecklas inom entreprenörskap, ledarskap och ingenjörskap? Då är Sigma Industry Development rätt företag för dig.



Sigma Industry Development är ett dotterbolag inom SIEN-koncernen som fortsätter sin framgångsrika tillväxtresa utan att tumma på kvalitet. Två år i följd har pris vunnits som ett av Sveriges bäst välskötta företag, samt topp10-ranking i medarbetartrivsel på nationell nivå. Med andra ord är manegen krattad för fortsatta framgångar och arbetsglädje.



Nu söker vi en konsultchef till sektionen Mekatronik. Sektionen utgörs idag av 13 ingenjörer inom AI, mjukvaru- och hårdvaruutveckling, test och verifiering. Du kommer ha fördelen att ansluta dig till en etablerad kundbas, men ha fria tyglar att sätta din prägel på verksamheten och dess framtida strategi, samtidigt som teamet vill utvecklas genom ditt ledarskap och målsättningar.


### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



Din uppgift är att hjälpa teamet och verksamheten att utvecklas ytterligare, genom att navigera mot hög tillväxt och säkerställa nya affärer. Din roll är mångfacetterad där du kommer arbetar med att anställa de bästa talangerna och utveckla dessa, samtidigt som du brinner för affärsutveckling där målet är att etablera nya kundsamarbeten och driver in de stora affärerna. Detta utan att varken köra slut på ditt bränsle eller skada den goda (arbets-) miljön.



Vi ser att du har erfarenhet från försäljning och ledarskap i konsultbranschen, samt ett brett nätverk i Stockholmsregionen och du är en person som inte bara snackar utan gillar att få saker att hända.



**Utbildning**



* MSc i Datavetenskap, Mekatronik, Teknisk fysik, eller liknande utbildningsbakgrund


**Erfarenhet inom**



* Ledarskap
* Försäljning
* Konsulttjänster


**Språkkunskap**



* Svenska och engelska, flytande i tal och skrift (båda är krav för anställning)

### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**



Om AI har en speciell plats i ditt ingenjörshjärta, betraktar vi detta som en extra fördel. Vi som företag är måna om att hålla jämna takt med omvärlden och vi har som strategi att kontinuerligt fördjupa oss i de fördelar artificiell intelligens för med sig, i syfte att öka produktivitet - för oss och våra kunder.


### **WE OFFER**



Sigma Industry Development erbjuder dig en plattform att forma din framtid. Ett företag där du kan briljera och bidra till det bättre.



**Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) – ett urval**



https://starforlife.org/



https://expectabettertomorrow.com/



https://www.parasport.se/



https://rfkhumanrights.org/leadership-council



**Våra Kärnvärden**



* Familjär identitet - vi värnar om och utmanar varandra i det dagliga arbetet
* Långsiktighet - vi vill växa tillsammans med individen på kort och lång sikt
* Jämställdhet och lika behandling - kom som du är!
* Kreativitet & action - vi är beslutsamma och agerar i sann entreprenörsanda; framåt
* Arbetsglädje - vi gillar att ha kul tillsammans!


**Till detta tillkommer följande förmåner**



* Mobiltelefon och abonnemang
* Liv- och olycksförsäkring
* Friskvårdsbidrag om 5000 SEK/år
* 30 dagar semester

### **MORE INFORMATION**



Om du vill vidareutvecklas i rollen som Konsultchef – ta dig mod och skicka in din ansökan till oss idag! Skriv även några rader med dina tankar om tjänsten. Intervjuer sker löpande så vänta inte.



Om du har frågor är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Oscar för frågor och mer info.



Oscar Silversparf, VD, Sigma Industry Development



+46 70 209 22 26



oscar.silversparf@sigma.se

Konsultchef Mekatronik
* #### **COMPANY**


Sigma Industry Development

Sweden

Mechanical Engineering, Hardware Electronics, Testing and Verification, Project Management, Software development embedded systems, Function development, System design, Project Management, Software development

Oscar Silversparf, oscar.silversparf@sigma.se, +46702092226

title: QA Engineer
description:
ComeOn Group in short
  
Founded in 2008, ComeOn Group is a leading global player in the rapidly growing iGaming market. Having launched its first online brand in 2010, ComeOn Group is running a wide range of exciting brands across multiple markets. Operating more than 20 brands on its proprietary platform providing a secure, innovative and entertainment-led player experience across casino and sports betting. ComeOn Group is an international employer within the iGaming industry and has over 500 talented employees across 7 main locations.
  
**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden- Hybrid. This is a fixed term contract position for 12 months and a chance of extension
  
As a ComeOn Exploratory tester, you will quality assess the different whitelabels under ComeOn, identify buggy areas and find creative ways to break software and identify potential problems. You will leave a lasting impact on the thousands of users that are using ComeOn and its suite of whitelabels for betting and playing.
  
Requirements
  
As an Exploratory tester, you will participate in test case creation and execution activities.
  
* Analyse user stories and create test cases to cover all the different user combinations
* Execute test cases to identify bugs and improve the software quality
* Estimate test activities to better gauge how long a test activity might take to complete
* Breakdown epic stories into sizeable development chunks to ensure there is a stream of smaller tasks available for test
* Assist in planning and controlling the test environment to make sure test environments are in healthy condition for test activities.
* Coordinate test activities during different phases of the project
* Communicate with all stakeholders to report the status of test and to highlight any issues that might hamper the release


There is also possibility to contribute to test automation by writing automation requirements to automation team or also to contribute in fixing or writing automation tests in Cypress
  
  

**Skills:**  

Lead and take responsibility for defining the manual test tasks from project start to finish. Report on progress in line with the processes and escalate issues and risks where appropriate
  
Create test strategies, test plans, test schedules, sign off documents with focus and maintenance of quality standards and validation techniques
  
Hands-on testing (UI, usability, Functional and Integration)
  
Testing client /server based web & mobile applications
  
Experience working in agile methods like SCRUM / KANBAN.
  
Experience with JIRA and TestRail or similar test management tools.
  
Knowledge of frontend automation using Cypress frameworks or any javascript based automation framework
  
Strong communication skills
  
Coordinate with business for acceptance tests
  
  

**Good to have:**  

REST-API testing using RestAssured or Postman
  
Knowledge or experience in any frontend automation
  
  

**Competencies:**  

Strong communicator
  
Team player
  
Problem solving
  
Curious
  
  

**Technology Stack for testing:**  

Jira, Postman, SQL, Report Portal, Jenkins, GitLab, BrowserStack, Lambdatest, Kibana, Grafana, Automation: Cypress, WDIO, RestAssured
  
Benefits
  
A competitive remuneration package!
  
Fantastic quarterly team events and weekly company events
  
A one-time bonus to help you set up a comfortable workstation at home (we’re truly Hybrid!)
  
On top of our Hybrid work arrangement, up to 40 days a year to work fully remote from anywhere
  
30 paid vacation days a year
  
Generous pension and insurance benefits
  
Brand new laptop and smartphone with fully paid plan
  
Generous health subsidy benefit
  
Company events, including breakfast mornings and Friday beers
  
  

At ComeOn, we've embraced a Hybrid Work model, giving our employees the flexibility to work some days at home. Our offices are thoughtfully designed to support this model, featuring practical workspaces for focused efforts and collaborative zones for dynamic creative exchanges. We believe in the power of collaboration to drive innovation and success. While our offices are known for their vibrant atmosphere, rest assured that our primary focus is on achieving results together. We prioritize efficiency and maintain a balance between hard work and camaraderie. When you visit our offices, expect a warm welcome and professional support. Choose ComeOn for your next career move, and experience a workplace that values productivity, teamwork, and the spirit of collaboration.
  
At ComeOn Group we value diversity, and we take concrete action to ensure fairness in our recruitment process. We are committed to assess candidates on their merit without discriminating against any applicant for whatever reason that is protected by law. We truly value you, as you are. Want to know more about us just visit our website www.comeon-group.com or any of our social media channels to take a deep dive into our culture!
  
LinkedIn
  
Instagram
  
Facebook
  
Glassdoor

title: Automation Engineer
description:
Automation Engineer


Swedium Global is looking for Automation Engineer for one of its customer


You will be working intimately with Process, Maintenance, Production and Software Engineering Teams, responsible for the higher-level system such as MES, ERP and PLM.  

  

The production environment has very high demands on cleanness, up-time to reach the set quality level, production efficiency and traceability. It will require a combination of proven technologies and design of new innovative solutions. We will work with the best solution providers globally.  

  

In general, you have a long experience in the field and have been driving large, innovative and challenging automation projects with very high demand on accuracy and scale.  

  

Specifically, you have a deep understanding and hands-on experience of integrating very diverse, complex, equipment into higher automation layers developing some of the most advanced control systems in the world. You work symbiotically with the Plant Design and Manufacturing Engineering teams, translating their inputs into crisp specifications and orchestrating the execution in an ecosystem of external suppliers and own developers.


Experience: Minimum 4+ years of experience.  

  

Key Responsibilities include but are not limited to:  

  

* Develop, maintain and implement the automation system in the factory.
* Commissioning of new equipment
* Fault finding as part of the maintenance procedure
* Work together with the Industrial Automation System Design team to test and verify upgrades and test applications.
* Be part of the team that will give our operations team the tools to run the most advanced and efficient production factory in the world.
* Review Engineering Design Documentation (Requirement specifications, Functional design, Logic diagrams, Test Cases, Test Records)
* Implement, test and commission systems in the aforementioned technologies

The below matrix needs to be filled by the candidate.

  

Low

  

Medium
